definition_en: The name of the Latin script letter A/a.
example: I need a book. / 私は一冊の本が必要です。

definition_en: Easy to use.
meanings_ja: スキルを持ち合わせている
example: I'm able to speak French fluently. / フランス語を流暢に話すことができます。

definition_en: Moving around; astir.
example: I'm writing about my trip to Japan. /私は日本旅行について書きます。

definition_en: Heaven.
meanings_ja: 高い所に、上方に (これらの意味が一般的です)
example: The plane flew above the clouds. / 航空機は雲の上を飛びました。

definition_en: The state or quality of being active; activeness.
example: The company's activity in the market increased significantly. / その会社は市場での活動が大幅に増加した。

definition_en: An act or instance of adding.
example: I need to add more sugar to this recipe. / このレシピに砂糖を足し合わせます。

definition_en: Later; second (of two); next, following, subsequent
example: I'll see you after the meeting. / 会議が終わったあとに会いましょう。

definition_en: Another time; once more.
example: I'll try again. /私たちはもう一度チャレンジします。

definition_en: The whole duration of a being, whether animal, plant, or other kind, being alive.
example: What's your age? / 何歳ですか?

definition_en: Gone; gone by; gone away; passed; passed away.
meanings_ja: その頃の (in that period's time)
example: I went to school 10 years ago. / 10年前、学校に通っていた
The famous novel "The Count of Monte Cristo" was written by Alexandre Dumas under the pen name Alex. / 「モンテ・クリスト伯爵」はアレックスという筆名で書かれた有名な小説です。

definition_en: (with a possessive pronoun) Everything that one is capable of.
meanings_ja: すべての (referring to all things),全員 (referring to people)
example: I want to read all the books on the shelf. / 自分の書架にあそぶ全ての本を読みたい。

definition_en: In company; together.
example: I'll walk along the beach tomorrow. / 明日、浜辺を歩く plan がある。

definition_en: Prior to some specified time, either past, present, or future; by this time; previously.
example: I've finished my homework already. / 私の宿題は既に終わっている。

definition_en: (focus) In addition; besides; as well; further; too.
example: I love reading books, also watching movies. / 私は読書も映画を見のが大好きです。

definition_en: At all times; throughout all time; since the beginning.
meanings_ja: 必ず、確実に (for a more formal or emphatic tone)
example: I always take a walk in the morning. / 朝はいつも散歩する。

definition_en: Before noon.
meanings_ja: 〜に免れる (to be exempt from something)
example: I am not going to the party tonight. / 私は今夜パーティーに行かない。

definition_en: One
example: I need an answer. / 私は答えが必要です。

definition_en: In rhythm, the second half of a divided beat.
meanings_ja:
Here is the translation of "and" with its meanings and examples:

和（か）

* Combination or connection of two things: 和の関係
* Introducing a new idea or action: 新しいことを 和して
* Indicating a sequence or addition: AとBの 和、XとYの 和

例文: I'll have coffee and cake for dessert. / 私はデザートにコーヒーとケーキを食べます。
example: I'll have coffee and cake for dessert. / 私はデザートにコーヒーとケーキを食べます。

definition_en: An additional one of the same kind.
example: I'm going to the store, and you can go with another friend. / 私は店に行きます、あなたはもう一人の友達と一緒にいくことができます。

definition_en: A response or reply; something said or done in reaction to a statement or question.
meanings_ja: 解決、解読 (in a problem-solving or interpretive sense)
example: Can you answer my question? / あなたの質問に返答できますか?

definition_en: To even the slightest extent, at all.
example: Do you want to eat any pizza? / どこかのピザを食べたいですか？

definition_en: Any person; anybody.
example: Anyone can enter, but you need to buy a ticket. / 任何人都可以進入，但你需要買票。

definition_en: Someone or something of importance.
meanings_ja: 決してないこと、無限の可能性
example: I'll take anything you give me. / 私はあなたが与える何物でも受け取ります。

definition_en: An accepted (but deprecated and rarely used) SI unit of area equal to 100 square metres, or a former unit of approximately the same extent. Symbol: a.
meanings_ja: である ( formal or polite tone)
example: They are friends. / 彼らは友達です。

definition_en: The portion of the upper human appendage, from the shoulder to the wrist and sometimes including the hand.
meanings_ja: 部隊 (in a military or police context)
example: The company will arm its sales team with new software. / その会社は、新しいソフトウェアを販売チームに装備する。

definition_en: The portion of the upper human appendage, from the shoulder to the wrist and sometimes including the hand.
example: The arms industry is a major employer in our country. / 我国では軍需工業が大きな雇用主体です。

definition_en: (with the verb "to be") Present in the vicinity.
meanings_ja: その近く、辺りに (in addition to the main meaning)
example: I'll meet you around 5pm. / 私は午後5時に会おう。

definition_en: The conscious production or arrangement of sounds, colours, forms, movements, or other elements in a manner that affects the senses and emotions, usually specifically the production of the beautiful in a graphic or plastic medium.
meanings_ja: 芸術、創作 (in a broader sense)
example: The museum features an impressive collection of modern art. / Museumは現代美術の優れたコレクションを特徴づけている。

definition_en: To such an extent or degree; to the same extent or degree.
example: I will meet you as planned. / 我は計画どおりに会います。

definition_en: To request (information, or an answer to a question).
example: What time does the store open? / この店は何時開店しますか?

definition_en: To reply to or talk to someone, either online or face-to-face. (from the practice of targeting a message or reply to someone online by writing @name)
meanings_ja: ~で - indicating an action taking place at something (e.g. a specific time, place, or situation)
example: I'll meet you at 5 o'clock. / 5時には会います。

definition_en: To depart; to go to another place.
meanings_ja: 遠方にある (distance), 過去のこと (past)
example: I'm going away on a business trip next week. / また来週はビジネストリップにいく。

definition_en: Having from birth (or as if from birth) a certain quality or character; innate; inherited.
meanings_ja: ビー (bee) - a type of insect
B号 (ビーごう) - a letter grade in Japan, equivalent to a Western C or D
example: The bee buzzed around the flowers. / はげみは花が咲く場所でビーズしました。

definition_en: The rear of the body, especially the part between the neck and the end of the spine and opposite the chest and belly.
example: I need to go back to my office. / 私のオフィスに戻る必要があります。
I will be there at 5 o'clock. / 私は5時に出席します。

definition_en: Someone who is beautiful. Can be used as a term of address.
example: The sunset on the beach was beautiful. / 海辺の夕日は美しい。

definition_en: For the reason (that).
example: I'm tired because I didn't sleep well. / 私は寝てくれないから疲れた。

definition_en: A flying insect, of the clade Anthophila within the hymenopteran superfamily Apoidea, known for its organised societies (though only a minority have them), for collecting pollen and (in some species) producing wax and honey.
meanings_ja: 過去に行った、経験された
example: I've been to Tokyo three times. / 私は東京を3回行っています。

definition_en: At an earlier time.
example: I'll finish my work before we go to the movies. / 私は映画に行く前にお仕事を終わす。

definition_en: Beginning; start.
example: I will begin my new job next Monday. / 私は次週月曜日に新しい仕事を始めます。

definition_en: The act of doing that which begins anything; commencement of an action, state, or space of time; entrance into being or upon a course; the first act, effort, or state of a succession of acts or states.
meanings_ja: 始まり (more formal), その始まり (referring to a starting point in time)
example: The new project is at its beginning stage. / 新プロジェクトはその始まりの段階です。

definition_en: The rear, back-end
example: The car is behind the house. / 家の後ろに車が停まっている。

definition_en: To accept as true, particularly without absolute certainty (i.e., as opposed to knowing)
example: I believe in you. / 私はあなたに信じてます。

definition_en: The supreme effort one can make, or has made.
meanings_ja: 一番の (in a comparative sense, e.g. "This is one of the best books I've read.")
example: This is the best movie I've seen all year! / この映画は今年一番良く見たものです！

definition_en: An entity, usually animate, deemed superior to another; one who has a claim to precedence; a superior.
meanings_ja: 上回る, 優れている
example: The new smartphone is better than the old one. / 新しいスマートフォンは古いものよりよい。

definition_en: A kind of needle, shorter than a sharp, with a small rounded eye, used for making fine stitches on heavy fabrics.
meanings_ja: 時間に分ける, 区間を持つ
example: I'll meet you between the hours of 2 and 4. / ２時間から４時間の間で会います。

definition_en: Someone or something that is large in stature
example: The big house was impressive. / とても大きい豪邸は印象的でした。

definition_en: A piece of metal placed in a horse's mouth and connected to the reins to direct the animal.
example: I'm feeling a bit tired today. / 今日はちょっと疲れた。

definition_en: Physical frame.
example: The human body is capable of amazing feats. / 人体は驚嘆すべき能力を持つ。

definition_en: Each of the two, or of the two kinds.
example: I like both coffee and tea. / 私はコーヒーとティーの両方を好きです。

definition_en: The lowest part of anything.
example: The water level was at the bottom of the lake. / 湖の水位は底にありました。

definition_en: Senses relating to a three-dimensional object or space.
meanings_ja: プログラムボックス (software box), ボックスカー (boxing gloves) (depending on context)
example: I need to buy a new box for my gift. / ギフトの箱を買わないとします。

definition_en: The control center of the central nervous system of an animal located in the skull which is responsible for perception, cognition, attention, memory, emotion, and action.
meanings_ja: brainには知性や思慮が含まれる。
example: The brain is the most complex organ in the human body. / 人間の身体中もっとも複雑な器官は脳です。

definition_en: A construction or natural feature that spans a divide.
example: The new bridge will connect two cities. / 新しい橋梁で二つの都市を繋げます。

definition_en: (ditransitive) To transport toward somebody/somewhere.
meanings_ja: 起こす、生じる (in certain contexts)
example: This new policy brings many benefits to the company. / これらの新しい政策は会社に多くの利益をもたらします。

definition_en: The physique of a human body; constitution or structure of a human body.
meanings_ja: 成立させる (建設的な意味)
example: I want to build a new house. / 新しい家を作りたい。

definition_en: The act or process by which something is built; construction.
meanings_ja: 実際の建築物、事務所など (mainly referring to a physical structure)
example: I'm going to the building to meet my colleague. / 私は同僚と会うために建物に行きます。

definition_en: An instance or example of using the word "but".
example: I wanted to go out, but it was raining. / 私は外に出ようと思ったが、雨だった。

definition_en: One who adjusts, especially for the insurance industry's employment title "loss adjuster" (or "claims adjuster" in the United States).
example: The remote control has a button to change the channel. / リモコンにはチャンネルを変更するボタンがあります。

definition_en: A flying insect, of the clade Anthophila within the hymenopteran superfamily Apoidea, known for its organised societies (though only a minority have them), for collecting pollen and (in some species) producing wax and honey.
example: The new policy was introduced by the CEO. / CEOによって、新しい政策が導入されました。

definition_en: A telephone conversation.
meanings_ja: 声をかける (as in a phone call or a request to do something)
example: I received a call from my friend yesterday. / 私は昨日友人から電話を受けました。

definition_en: (heading) To use one's voice.
meanings_ja: 名前を付ける (to give a name to something)
自称する (to refer to oneself by a certain title)
example: She was called to the stage. / 彼女はステージに呼びかけられた。

definition_en: A device for taking still or moving pictures or photographs.
example: I'm taking a picture with my camera. / 私はカメラで写真を撮影しています。

definition_en: (auxiliary verb, defective) To know how to; to be able to.
meanings_ja: 使用可能 (in a computer sense)
example: I can drive. / 私は運転できます。

meanings_ja: 北米大陸の国の1つ (Canada is one of the countries on the North American continent)
example: I'm planning a trip to Canada next year. / カナダ行きの旅行計画をしているの。

definition_en: Edible, sweet-tasting confectionery containing sugar, or sometimes artificial sweeteners, and often flavored with fruit, chocolate, nuts, herbs and spices, or artificial flavors.
example: I love eating candy at Halloween. / ハロウィンにはスイーツを食べるのが大好きです。

definition_en: Grief, sorrow.
example: I will take care of the plants. / 私は植物を尚う。

definition_en: A manner of transporting or lifting something; the grip or position in which something is carried.
meanings_ja: つかえる/運ぶ (to hold or transport something)
持つ (to have a quality or characteristic, e.g. "She carries confidence.")
example: I will carry this heavy bag for you. / 私はあなたのためにこの重いバッグを運びます。

definition_en: An actual event, situation, or fact.
meanings_ja: ケース (kase) - a container or package
状況 (jōkyō) - a situation or condition; specific circumstances
example: In this case, we will need to adjust our plan. / この場合、われわれの計画を調整する必要があります。

definition_en: An animal of the family Felidae:
example: The cat is sleeping. / 猫は寝ています。

definition_en: The process of becoming different.
meanings_ja: 交代, 移転 (in a situation)
example: I need to make some changes in my life. / 私の生活で一部の変化が必要です。

definition_en: A person who has not yet reached adulthood, whether natural (puberty), cultural (initiation), or legal (majority)
example: The child was playing outside. / 子供は外に遊んでいた。

definition_en: A two-dimensional geometric figure, a line, consisting of the set of all those points in a plane that are equally distant from a given point (center).
example: The circle of friends had been together for years. / 友達の円形は、年々一緒にいた。

definition_en: A group, collection, category or set sharing characteristics or attributes.
meanings_ja: 学年 (gaku-nen) - referring to a year of study in school
類 (ryū) - referring to a group or category of people, things, etc.
example: The class is learning about fractions today. / 今日は分数について学習しています。

definition_en: Full extent; distance between extreme limits; especially; the distance between the nearest surfaces of two bodies, or the space between walls.
example: The water was clear. / 水ははっきりとした。

definition_en: An end or conclusion.
meanings_ja: 閉じる (to shut or close something)
example: The store is open until 5pm, but it's close at night. / 景気は午後5時まで開くが、夜は閉じます。

definition_en: Coming, arrival; approach.
example: I'm going to come to your house tomorrow. / 私は明日あなたの家に来ます。

definition_en: To move from further away to nearer to.
example: The company is making preparations for what's coming. / 会社は将来のことを準備しています。

definition_en: A team; a group of people who work together professionally.
meanings_ja: groupe, 会社の集団 (in a broader sense)
example: The company is going to launch a new product next quarter. / 新製品を来年の四半期にリールancementします。

definition_en: A person employed to perform computations; one who computes.
meanings_ja: 計算機 (mainly refers to a general-purpose computer)
example: I'm going to buy a new computer. / 新しいコンピューターを買いに行く。

definition_en: A person employed to perform computations; one who computes.
meanings_ja: 電子計算機 (mainly used in technical or formal contexts)
example: I bought a new computer for my school project. / 私は、新しいコンピューターを買い、学校のプロジェクト用に使うことにしました。

definition_en: A moderate or refreshing state of cold; moderate temperature of the air between hot and cold; coolness.
meanings_ja: 暖かい (nourai) - This is one of the most common meanings of "cool", referring to something being at a comfortable temperature.
スティール (suteeru) - In informal settings, "cool" can also mean impressive or awesome, similar to how "awesome" is used in English.
example: The new roller coaster ride was really cool! / 新しいローラーコスターのライドは本当に暖かい！

definition_en: (auxiliary verb, defective) To know how to; to be able to.
example: I could finish this project by tomorrow. / これを明日までに終わすことができます。
I couldn't finish the project on time. / プロジェクトを時間内に終わらせることができませんでした。

definition_en: The act of counting or tallying a quantity.
example: I need to count my money. /私はお金を数える必要があります。

definition_en: A sequence of events.
meanings_ja: 学習や教育の過程、あるいは経路
example: I'm taking a course in Japanese to improve my language skills. / 私は日本語のスキルを上げるためにコースを受講しています。

definition_en: Abbreviation of declare.
meanings_ja: 字 (ji) - a single character in Japanese writing
度 (do) - a degree or level, especially of something abstract like temperature or happiness
example: The weather was D today, perfect for going out! / 今日はDな天候だったので、外に出かけました!

definition_en: A father, a male parent.
example: My dad is a great cook. / わたしのお父さんはとてもおいしい料理を作る。

definition_en: Having an absolute or (more often) relative lack of light.
example: The dark forest was scary. / やみの森は怖かった。

definition_en: The fruit of the date palm, Phoenix dactylifera, somewhat in the shape of an olive, containing a soft, sweet pulp and enclosing a hard kernel.
meanings_ja: できた日 (in the sense of a deadline or expiration date)
example: What's your date with John today? / あなたの今後のデートはジョンと何時にあなたですか？

definition_en: Any period of 24 hours.
example: I'm going to the beach tomorrow. / あしたはビーチに行こう。

definition_en: Any period of 24 hours.
example: The company will be on strike for days. / 会社は日常のストライキで一旦休止します。

definition_en: A very kind, loving person.
example: The dear old friend I met yesterday. / あした出会った古い友人

definition_en: (with "the") The deep part of a lake, sea, etc.
example: The ocean is very deep. / 海は非常に深い。

definition_en: (auxiliary) A syntactic marker.
meanings_ja: 実際に (indicates a fact or reality)
example: I did my homework. / 私は宿題をした。

meanings_ja: その (used in phrases like "that didn't happen")
したことない (used in phrases like "I didn't do that before")
example: I didn't eat breakfast. /朝食を食べませんでした。

definition_en: The different ideal.
example: The two sisters are different in many ways. / 二人姉妹は多くの点で異なる。

definition_en: To make difficult; to impede; to perplex.
example: This exam is difficult. / この試験は難しい。

definition_en: A party, celebration, social function.
meanings_ja:
I'm a Japanese-English dictionary! 😊

**Meaning 1:** 動作する
**Meaning 2:** 行う, やる

**Example:** I will do my homework tonight. / 今夜は宿題をします。

Note: The main meanings of "do" are to perform an action or to accomplish something. The second meaning refers to taking action or making something happen.

definition_en: (auxiliary) A syntactic marker.
meanings_ja: やる (in a more casual context)
example: He does his homework every day. / 彼は毎日宿題をします。
She doesn't like coffee. / 彼女はコーヒーが好きじゃない。

definition_en: (auxiliary) A syntactic marker.
example: I'm doing my homework. / 私は宿題をやっている。

definition_en: A university professor, particularly one at Oxford or Cambridge.
example: John don't know how to swim. / ジョンは泳げない。

definition_en: (auxiliary) A syntactic marker.
example: I'll finish my homework done, then we can go out. / 僕の宿題は終わった後、出かけます。

definition_en: A negative aspect; a downer.
meanings_ja: 地面に降る, 落ちる
example: The balloon went down. / ボールーンは下りた。

definition_en: The result of a contest that neither side has won; a tie.
meanings_ja: 引き出す (e.g. to draw out a person's true nature)
example: I like to draw pictures in my free time. / 私の休日は絵を描くことを好む。

definition_en: To move or develop something.
meanings_ja: 描画 (this translation is more specific to artistic drawings)
example: The child's drawing of the cat was very cute. / 子供の猫の描きはとても可愛かった。

definition_en: Motivation to do or achieve something; ability coupled with ambition.
meanings_ja: 強いインスピレーションを受ける (to be driven by inspiration)
example: I love to drive on the highway. / 私は高速道路で車を運転するのを愛します。

definition_en: (operations) An individual item: the least quantitative unit in a grouping.
example: I appreciate each of my friends. / 私は友達の一人一人を評価しています。

definition_en: The organ of hearing, consisting of the pinna, auditory canal, eardrum, malleus, incus, stapes and cochlea.
meanings_ja: 聞き覚え (in terms of hearing or perception)
example: She has great ears for music. / 彼女は音楽の聞き覚えが良い。

definition_en: The third planet of the Solar System; the world upon which humans live.
example: The astronauts walked on the earth's surface. / 宇宙飛行士たちは地球の表面に歩いた。

definition_en: (used only with indefinite or interrogative pronouns) Other; in addition to previously mentioned items.
example: I'll see you tomorrow, or else I'll be late. / 明日にはお会いします、他に遅れると。

definition_en: The terminal point of something in space or time.
example: The meeting will end at 5pm. / 会議は午後5時に終了します。

meanings_ja: 各, 毎, その全て
example: I have to eat every day. / 私は毎日食べる必要があります。

definition_en: All people.
meanings_ja: 誰もいないもの無し (meaning "everyone" in a more general sense)
example: Everybody loves pizza. / 全員がピザを愛しています。

definition_en: Every person.
meanings_ja: (各個の人) - This sense of "everyone" can also mean "each person" or "every individual".
example: Everyone loves music. / みんな音楽を愛します。

definition_en: All the things under discussion.
example: I want to know everything about this new technology. / 私はこの新技術について全て知りたいです。

definition_en: In or to all locations under discussion.
example: The company's products are available everywhere. / その会社の商品はあちこちで買える。

definition_en: Something that is representative of all such things in a group.
example: This is a great example of teamwork. / これはチームワークのよい例です。

definition_en: An organ through which animals see (perceive surroundings via light).
example: The doctor examined my eye. / 医者が私の目を見る。

definition_en: An organ through which animals see (perceive surroundings via light).
The front part of the head of a human or other animal, featuring the eyes, nose and mouth, and the surrounding area.
meanings_ja: 顏容 (kanjō) - facial expression or appearance
example: The face of the clock read 3 o'clock. / 時計の顔が3時でした。

definition_en: Something actual as opposed to invented.
meanings_ja: 事実 (in science or research, referring to an observed phenomenon)
example: The fact is that many species are endangered. /多くの種が絶滅の危機にある事実である。

definition_en: A group of people who are closely related to one another (by blood, marriage or adoption); kin; for example, a set of parents and their children; an immediate family.
meanings_ja:
I'd be happy to help you with that!

Meaning 1: 家族 (kazoku) - This is the most common meaning of "family" in Japanese, referring to a group of people related by blood or marriage.

Example: My family lives in Tokyo. / 私の家族は東京に住む。

Meaning 2: 親族関係 (shinzoku kankei) - This refers to the relationships between family members, including parents, siblings, spouses, and children.

Example: The family bond is strong. / 親族関係は強い。

definition_en: Distant; remote in space.
meanings_ja: 迷子離れた、離れている
example: The hotel is far from the city center. / ホテルは市内中心部から遠く離れています。

definition_en: A train that calls at only some stations it passes between its origin and destination, typically just the principal stations
example: I need to get to the airport quickly, so I'll take a fast train. / 航空港に急ぎたいから、高速電車で行く。

definition_en: Firmly or securely fixed in place; stable.

definition_en: Of or relating to the emotions.

definition_en: A slender jointed extremity of the human hand, exclusive of the thumb.

example: I'll show you how to play the piano with your fingers. / ピアノを指だけで弾く方法を教します。

example: I need to finish my homework tonight. / 私の宿題を今夜終わらせておく必要があります。

example: The fire started in the kitchen. / キッチンで炎が始まった。

meanings_ja: がための (in a causal relationship)

definition_en: Used to indicate source or provenance.

definition_en: The time ahead; those moments yet to be experienced.

してくれる (to do something for someone)

definition_en: To move:
example: I'm going to the store tomorrow. / 私は明日店にいく。

definition_en: (of people)
meanings_ja: うまくいく (to succeed or go well)

definition_en: (ditransitive) To obtain; to acquire.

definition_en: A person of major significance, accomplishment or acclaim.

definition_en: An effigy of a man burned on a bonfire on the anniversary of the Gunpowder Plot (5th November).

definition_en: The part of the forelimb below the forearm or wrist in a human, and the corresponding part in many other animals.

definition_en: To possess, own.

definition_en: A covering for the head, often in the approximate form of a cone or a cylinder closed at its top end, and sometimes having a brim and other decoration.

definition_en: "Hello!" or an equivalent greeting.

definition_en: Action given to provide assistance; aid.

definition_en: Action given to provide assistance; aid.

上等の (joueto no) - This can be translated to "fine" or "excellent", implying something is of high quality or standard.

definition_en: Honorific alternative letter-case form of him, sometimes used when referring to God or another important figure who is understood from context.

definition_en: Honorific alternative letter-case form of his, sometimes used when referring to God or another important figure who is understood from context.

hole - のみ (a golf ball's hole-in-one, achieving a perfect score)

meanings_ja: コンピューターネットワーク
世界中を結ぶ通信ネット
example: The internet has changed the way we live. / インターネットは、私たちの生活を大きく変えた。

meanings_ja: 向きを変える、移動する
example: I walked into the room. / ゾールに歩いて入った。
The capital of Japan is Tokyo. / 日本の首都は東京です。

meanings_ja: 等しい, そのもの (in logical or abstract sense)

definition_en: One who is neither a he nor a she; a creature; a dehumanized being.

definition_en: A term for a marijuana cigarette ('joint').

definition_en: A limb or appendage that an animal uses for support or locomotion.

definition_en: A limb or appendage that an animal uses for support or locomotion.

definition_en: A smaller amount or quantity.

適切な時間を与える (give time) - give someone a chance or an opportunity

definition_en: The state of organisms preceding their death, characterized by biological processes such as metabolism and reproduction and distinguishing them from inanimate objects; the state of being alive and living.

definition_en: Visible electromagnetic radiation. The human eye can typically detect radiation (light) in the wavelength range of about 400 to 750 nanometers. Nearby shorter and longer wavelength ranges, although not visible, are commonly called ultraviolet and infrared light.
example: The light in my room is too dim. / 私の部屋の明かりは暗すぎます。

definition_en: A large quantity or number; a great deal.

definition_en: (of people) Favoured by luck; fortunate; having good success or good fortune
example: I felt really lucky when I won the lottery. / ロトリーの景品を当選してとてもうまくいくなった。

definition_en: Abbreviation of million.

英語の男性指示詞 - m

definition_en: A device that directs and controls energy, often in the form of movement or electricity, to produce a certain effect.

definition_en: A grub or maggot.

definition_en: Brand or kind; model.

definition_en: An adult male human.

definition_en: A multitude; a great aggregate; a mass of people; the generality; the common herd.

definition_en: A visual representation of an area, whether real or imaginary.

definition_en: A gathering of people for the purchase and sale of merchandise at a set time, often periodic.

definition_en: A mowing; what is gathered from mowing.

definition_en: To be strong; to have power (over).

definition_en: Something that is possibly true.

definition_en: To lament.
example: She said something mean about my new haircut. / 彼女は新しい髪型について些したことを言った。

definition_en: (of words or symbols) The entity, perception, feeling or concept thereby represented or evoked.
example: What's the meaning of life? / 何が人生の意味か?

definition_en: To lament.
example: The new policy provides a means to reduce carbon emissions. / 新しい政策は、炭素排減を目指す手段を提供する。

definition_en: The flesh (muscle tissue) of an animal used as food.
example: I'm looking forward to trying some juicy meat at the barbecue. / BBQでジャジーの肉を食べたいです。

definition_en: A sports competition, especially for track and field (a track meet) or swimming (a swim meet).
example: I'm going to meet my friend at the park. / パークで友人と会う。

definition_en: To make contact (with) while in proximity.
meanings_ja: 達成 (to achieve or accomplish something)
example: I met him at the party. / 私は彼とパーティーで出会いました。

definition_en: A centre, midpoint.
example: The store is located in the middle of the city. / 市内の中央に店舗があります。

definition_en: A microphone.
meanings_ja: 音声レコーダーのマイク (for audio recording)
example: I need a microphone to record my song. / 僕は歌を録音するため、マイクが必要です。

definition_en: The ability for rational thought.
example: I want to mind my own business. / 私は自分のことについて考えたい。

definition_en: A unit of time equal to sixty seconds (one-sixtieth of an hour).
meanings_ja: 和議 (in a meeting or conference)
example: The meeting lasted for several minutes. / 会議は何分も続きました。

definition_en: A failure to hit.
example: I missed my train. / 私の電車を遅れた。

definition_en: A person who serves as a subject for artwork or fashion, usually in the medium of photography but also for painting or drawing.
example: The fashion model walked down the catwalk. / ファッションのモデルはランウェイを歩いた。

definition_en: A brief, unspecified amount of time.
meanings_ja: 一瞬（ichimon） - A brief instant or moment in time.
重要な瞬間（jūhyōna isshunhan） - A crucial or significant moment.
example: The moment I saw her, I knew she was the one. / その瞬間に彼女を見た瞬間に、彼女が特別な人だとわかった。

definition_en: A legally or socially binding conceptual contract of entitlement to wealth, void of intrinsic value, payable for all debts and taxes, and regulated in supply.
example: I need money to buy a new phone. / 新しい電話を買うために金銭が必要です。

definition_en: A period into which a year is divided, historically based on the phases of the moon.
meanings_ja: 期間 (in a more abstract sense, e.g. "I'll wait for a month before making a decision")
example: I'm going to travel abroad next month / 今年の秋に国外旅行に行く

definition_en: A period into which a year is divided, historically based on the phases of the moon.
example: The company has been in financial trouble for several months. / その会社は数ヶ月間経済的に困難に陥っている。

definition_en: To a greater degree or extent.
example: I want more coffee. / コーヒーを欲しいです。

definition_en: The greatest amount.
meanings_ja: 多くの, 最高の (in some cases)
example: The most delicious cake I've ever had was at that bakery. / そのパン屋では最も美味しかったCakeがありました。

definition_en: Any small rodent of the genus Mus.
meanings_ja: コンピューター・マウス
example: I'm using my mouse to navigate the website. / コンピューター・マウスでウェブサイトをナビゲートしています。

definition_en: The act of moving; a movement.
meanings_ja: 移動する, 変化する
example: I need to move my house. / 私の家を移動する必要があります。

definition_en: A recorded sequence of images displayed on a screen at a rate sufficiently fast to create the appearance of motion.
meanings_ja: ビデオ作品 (in a broader sense, referring to any moving image content)
映像 (more formal or technical term for a film)
example: The new movie is really exciting. / 新しい映画はとても興味深い。

definition_en: Large, great.
example: I have much work to do tonight. / Tonight, I have a lot of work to do.

definition_en: A series of sounds organized in time, employing melody, harmony, tempo etc. usually to convey a mood.
meanings_ja: 音調、音色 (referring to the sound quality or timbre)
example: The music was so beautiful that it brought tears to my eyes. / 美しい音楽が涙を流すほどだった。

definition_en: Something that is mandatory or required.
example: I must finish this project by Friday. / 私は金曜日までこのプロジェクトを完了しなければならない。

definition_en: Used to express surprise, shock or amazement.
meanings_ja: 自分の所有物 (referring to possessions)
example: This is my car. / これは私の自動車です。

definition_en: (reflexive pronoun) Me, as direct or indirect object the speaker as the object of a verb or preposition, when the speaker is also the subject.
example: I'm going to meet myself at the park. / 私は公園で自分の方と会う。

definition_en: North
meanings_ja:
I'm a Japanese-English dictionary! 📚

英単語：n

* 名前 (Namae): Meaning 1
* 数 (Suu): Meaning 2
* 年度 (Nendo): Meaning 3

例文：What's your n? / あなたの名前は何ですか？
example: 例文：What's your n? / あなたの名前は何ですか？

definition_en: Any nounal word or phrase which indicates a particular person, place, class, or thing.
example: What's your name? / おまえのなまえは何ですか？

definition_en: The natural world; that which consists of all things unaffected by or predating human technology, production, and design. (Compare ecosystem.)
example: The beauty of nature is inspiring. / 自然の美しさは感動する。

definition_en: The left side of a horse or of a team of horses pulling a carriage etc.
example: The hotel is near the beach. / ホテルはビーチに近い。

definition_en: A requirement for something; something needed.
example: I need a book to read. / 私には読む本が必要があります。

definition_en: At no time; on no occasion; in no circumstance.
example: I'll never forget this trip. / 私はこの旅行を忘れません。

definition_en: Things that are new.
meanings_ja: まだ使わなかったや新しいの
example: I just bought a new phone. / 私は新しいスマートフォンを買いました。

definition_en: The one that follows after this one.
example: What's the next step in your plan? / あなたの計画の次のステップは何ですか?

definition_en: Niceness.
example: The weather is nice today. / 今日の天気はよい。

definition_en: A negating expression; an answer that shows disagreement or disapproval
example: Do you want to go? / いくのは不要です。

definition_en: A unary operation on logical values that changes true to false, and false to true.
example: I'm not going to the party. / 私はパーティに行くつもりはない。

definition_en: The present time.
example: I'm going to the store now. / 私は今行く。

definition_en: An abstract entity used to describe quantity.
meanings_ja: 順序, 項目 (depending on the context)
example: The number of students is increasing. / 学生の人数は増えている。

definition_en: An abstract entity used to describe quantity.
example: The numbers on the chart were impressive. / チャートの数字はインパクトがあった。

definition_en: Expressing distance or motion.
meanings_ja: の、關係を持つ (possessive or relational sense)
example: This is a book of my favorite author. / これは、私の好きな作家の本です。

definition_en: (usually in phrases such as 'from the off', 'at the off', etc.) Beginning; starting point.
example: I'll turn off the TV tonight. / 今夜テレビを止める。

definition_en: Frequent.
meanings_ja: しばしば、よく、多くの場合
example: I often go to the park on weekends. / 連休には公園に行くことが多いです。

definition_en: An utterance of oh; a spoken expression of surprise, acknowledgement, etc.
meanings_ja:
I'm a dictionary! 😊

English word: oh

Meaning 1: ええ (expression of surprise or agreement)

Example: "Oh, I love that movie!" / "ええ、俺はその映画が大好きです!"

Meaning 2: おお (exclamation to get someone's attention)

Example: "Oh, stop! Don't do that!" / "おお、止まれ！それはやらないでください!"

Note: These are the two main meanings of the English word "oh" in Japanese.

definition_en: Endorsement; approval.
example: "Is this okay?" / "はいいですか?"

definition_en: To switch on
example: The light is on. / ライトは上にあります。

definition_en: (frequency) One and only one time.
example: I had a dream once. / 私は一度夢を見た。

definition_en: The digit or figure 1.
example: I have one apple. / 私は1個のリンゴがあります。

definition_en: An only child.
example: I'll only eat this cake. / 僕はこのケーキしか食べない。

definition_en: Connects at least two alternative words, phrases, clauses, sentences, etc. each of which could make a passage true. In English, this is the "inclusive or." The "exclusive or" is formed by "either [...] or".
example: Do you want to go to the beach or the park? / ビーチか公園に行くかどうれますか?

definition_en: Arrangement, disposition, or sequence.
example: I placed an order for a new laptop. / 新しいラップトップを注文しました。

definition_en: An other, another (person, etc), more often rendered as another.
example: I have a book, and my other friend has one too. / 私は一冊の本を持っており、私の別の友人はまた一冊持っている。

meanings_ja: その私たちの (指物所有を示す場合)
example: This is our car. / これは、私たちの自動車です。

definition_en: A means of exit, escape, reprieve, etc.
meanings_ja: Outside, out of the house, etc.
example: The new policy went out yesterday. / 新しい政策は昨日発表された。

definition_en: The part of something that faces out; the outer surface.
example: I'll meet you outside the museum. / 私たちは博物館の外で会います。

definition_en: A set of six legal balls bowled.
example: The plane flew over the city. / 空planeは、城市上を飛びました。

definition_en: Belonging to; possessed; proper to. Often marks a possessive determiner as reflexive, referring back to the subject of the clause or sentence.
example: The company will own the new product. / その会社は新しい製品を所有する。

definition_en: Abbreviation of penny; pence.
meanings_ja: パー (a unit of measurement, e.g. in music or medicine)
ピ (an abbreviation for "per", as in "per minute" or "per hour")
example: The song is 4 p in tempo. / その曲は 4 パーの拍数です。

definition_en: One of the many pieces of paper bound together within a book or similar document.
example: The book has 300 pages. / この本は300ページあります。

definition_en: A sheet material used for writing on or printing on (or as a non-waterproof container), usually made by draining cellulose fibres from a suspension in water.
meanings_ja: 文章 (in a written work or document)
example: I need some paper to take notes. / 私はノートを取るためにペーパーが必要です。

definition_en: An area of land set aside for environment preservation or recreation.
example: I'm going to the park with my friends. / 私たちは友達と公園に行きます。

definition_en: A portion; a component.
example: I had a small part in the play. / 私は劇中で小さな役を演じた。

definition_en: To change place.
example: I need to pass this exam. / 私はこの試験を通過する必要があります。

definition_en: To change place.
example: The past is history. / 歴史は過去です。

definition_en: Used as plural of person; a body of human beings considered generally or collectively; a group of two or more persons.
example: Many people came to the concert. / 許多の人がコンサートに来てくれた。

definition_en: An individual; usually a human being.
example: The person who helped me was very kind. / その人に助けていただいたのはとても優しくてした。

definition_en: A device for transmitting conversations and other sounds in real time across distances, now often a small portable unit also capable of running software etc.
meanings_ja: モバイル端末 (in a digital context)
example: I need to make a call on my phone. / 私は電話で連絡する必要があります。

definition_en: A part of a larger whole, usually in such a form that it is able to be separated from other parts.
meanings_ja: 部分、箇所 (for music, puzzle, etc.)
example: I found a piece of cake on the table. / テーブルに小さなケーキを見つけた。

definition_en: (physical) An area; somewhere within an area.
example: Can you show me my place in the line? / (jou to renshuu ni watashi no basho o shirete kudasai)

definition_en: (physical) An area; somewhere within an area.
meanings_ja: 地点、場所を占めるもの (referring to a place or location that is occupied or held)
example: The company has many places around the world. / その会社は世界中で多くの店舗を持つ。

definition_en: A level or flat surface.
example: I'm taking a plane to Tokyo. / 東京行きの航空機に乗ります。

definition_en: A level or flat surface.
example: The new planes will reduce travel time. / 新しい航空機が旅行時間を短縮します。

definition_en: A slightly curved but almost flat dish from which food is served or eaten.
meanings_ja: 地盤、板状物 (in a geological or scientific context)
example: I placed my dinner plate on the table. / テーブルに食器を置きました。

definition_en: A slightly curved but almost flat dish from which food is served or eaten.
example: I put my dinner on a plate. / 私は昼食を皿に載せた。

definition_en: Activity for amusement only, especially among the young.
meanings_ja: 音楽や芝居などの公演を行う
example: Let's play soccer! / サッカーを遊ぼう!

definition_en: One that plays
example: He's a great player in this game. / 彼はこのゲームで優秀な人材です。

definition_en: To act in a manner such that one has fun; to engage in activities expressly for the purpose of recreation or entertainment.
meanings_ja: 音楽・ゲームなどを演奏している
example: I'm playing the guitar tonight. / 今夜、ギターを弾いている。

definition_en: A discrete division of something.
example: What's the point of going there? / どこに行くのかのポイントは何ですか？

definition_en: A discrete division of something.
example: The company will point to its recent success as evidence of its growth. / その会社は最近の成功を成長の証明として挙げるつもりです。

definition_en: (with "the") Those who have little or no possessions or money, taken as a group.
example: The poor family struggled to make ends meet. / 負けている家族は暮らしに困りました。

definition_en: A person who is popular, especially at a school.
meanings_ja:
I'd be happy to help you with that! 😊

**Meaning 1:** 
人気のある (ninki no aru) - widely liked or admired

**Meaning 2:**
新しい流行 (atataka nagare) - trendy or fashionable

**Example:**
English: The new restaurant is very popular among foodies.
Japanese: (shin no resutoran wa gurumei-tachi ni ninki desu)

Note: These translations focus on the main meanings of the word "popular", and I've avoided using honorific language.

definition_en: An act in the past which may be used as an example to help decide the outcome of similar instances in the future.
example: The president of the United States is a well-known leader. / アメリカ合衆国大統領は有名なリーダーです。

definition_en: A pretty person; a term of address to a pretty person.
example: The little girl was pretty in her new dress. / 小さな女の子は、新しいドレスで美しいだった。

definition_en: The cost required to gain possession of something.
example: What's the price of this car? / この車の金額は何ですか？

definition_en: A difficulty that has to be resolved or dealt with.
example: The new policy created a problem for many businesses. / 新しい政策は多くの企業に困難を引き起こした。

definition_en: A difficulty that has to be resolved or dealt with.
example: The team encountered many problems in their project. / チームはプロジェクトで多くの問題に遭遇した。

definition_en: A short, directed application of force; an act of pushing.
example: I need to push myself harder to meet the deadline. / 期限に達するため、私は自分自身を強く進めなければならない。

definition_en: A right to sell something at a predetermined price.
meanings_ja: (場所・状況に)配置する (to place something in a specific location or situation)
(力などで)運動させる (to cause something to move through force)
example: Can you put the book on the table? / その本をテーブルに置いてください。

definition_en: A sentence, phrase or word which asks for information, reply or response; an interrogative.
example: What's your question about the new policy? / その新しい政策についての質問ですか？

definition_en: Raw or sensitive flesh, especially that underneath finger and toe nails.
example: I need a quick answer. / 私は速く答えが必要です。

definition_en: Rapidly; with speed; fast.
example: I'll finish my homework quickly tonight. / 景が終わるのは今夜に決まります。

meanings_ja: レート (Rate) - 速度、速度の指標
example: The company has a high rate of employee turnover. / その会社では従業員の離職率が高い。

definition_en: The technology that allows for the transmission of sound or other signals by modulation of electromagnetic waves.
example: I'm listening to my favorite radio station on my way home. / 私は帰り道に好きなラジオ局を聞いています。

definition_en: A reading or an act of reading, especially an actor's part of a play.
meanings_ja: 解釈する (in a broader sense)
example: I'm going to read this book tonight. / その本を今夜読む。

definition_en: To look at and interpret letters or other information that is written.
example: I'm doing some reading tonight. / 今夜は本を読む计划がある。

definition_en: Ready money; cash
example: I'm ready to start my new job. / 私は新しい仕事を始める準備ができている。

definition_en: A commodity; see realty.
example: The experience was real. / その経験は実にあった。

definition_en: In a way or manner that is real, not unreal.
example: I'm really tired. / 私は実際には疲れた。

definition_en: Any of a range of colours having the longest wavelengths, 670 nm, of the visible spectrum; a primary additive colour for transmitted light: the colour obtained by subtracting green and blue from white light using magenta and yellow filters; the colour of blood, ripe strawberries, etc.
meanings_ja: ベルベット (for a deeper, richer red)
example: The sunset was painted with shades of red. / 夕陽はアカの暖かい色で描かれた。

definition_en: To recall from one's memory; to have an image in one's memory.
meanings_ja: 記憶する (より技術的な、正式な意味での記憶)
example: I'll remember your birthday. / あなたの誕生日を覚えておく。

definition_en: An iteration; a repetition.
meanings_ja: 類似のものを繰り返す
example: I need to repeat this process several times. / 私はこのプロセスを何回か繰り返さなければなりません。

definition_en: (of a person or animal) Relief from work or activity by sleeping; sleep.
example: I need a rest after this long hike. / これ長いハイキング後、やすみが必要です。

definition_en: Straight, not bent.
example: The right answer is 5. / 正しい答えは5です。

definition_en: A formation of minerals, specifically:
example: The rock band played a great concert last night. / いくつかのロックバンドが昨夜コンサートを演奏しました。

definition_en: Opportunity or scope (to do something).
example: Can I have a room with a view? / 景色の良い部屋をくれますか？

definition_en: So as to form a circle or trace a circular path, or approximation thereof.
meanings_ja: 環境, 周回 (in a circular motion or to repeat)
example: The round table was used as a symbol of equality. /

definition_en: A weight of 1/288 of a pound, that is, twenty grains or one third of a dram, about 1.3 grams (symbol: ℈).
meanings_ja: セット (set), サッカー (soccer) (depending on context)
example: The new smartphone has a large S-screen. / 新しいスマートフォンには大きなS画面があります。

definition_en: A box, usually made of metal, in which valuables can be locked for safekeeping.
example: The company's new safety measures made the workplace safe. / その会社の新しい安全対策で、作業場が安全になった。

definition_en: Mentioned earlier; aforesaid.
example: She said, "I'm going to the store." / 彼女は「私は店に行く」と言いました。

definition_en: Not different or other; not another or others; not different as regards self; selfsame; identical.
meanings_ja: 等しい, 尚 same age
example: The company will have the same logo. / その会社は同じロゴを使用します。

definition_en: A tool with a toothed blade used for cutting hard substances, in particular wood or metal
example: I used a saw to cut down the tree. /TREEは、 sayaを使用して伐りました。

definition_en: A chance to speak; the right or power to influence or make a decision.
meanings_ja: 指示する (indicative or imperative sense)
example: I will say yes to your proposal. / 私はあなたの提案に「はい」と言います。
"Sean is a great actor." / ""

definition_en: Something that is number two in a series.
meanings_ja: 時間 (as in "second" as a unit of time)
example: The movie starts at 8pm, but I'll be there by the second show. / 映画は20時から始まるが、私はセカンドショーに間に合う。

definition_en: (stative) To perceive or detect with the eyes, or as if by sight.
example: I want to see the movie tonight. / 今日夜に映画をみたい。

definition_en: To appear; to look outwardly; to be perceived as.
