Let me know if you have any further requests! 😊

definition_en: (stative) To perceive or detect with the eyes, or as if by sight.
meanings_ja: 見た、理解した (in a figurative sense)
example: She has seen some amazing things in her travels. / 她は旅行で驚くべきことを目撃した。

definition_en: (stative) To perceive or detect with the eyes, or as if by sight.
meanings_ja: 認識する (to recognize or understand)
example: She sees the importance of teamwork. / 彼女はチームワークの重要性を認識しています。

definition_en: Any of the manners by which living beings perceive the physical world: for humans sight, smell, hearing, touch, taste.
example: I have a sense of accomplishment after finishing my project. /プロジェクトを完了した後、私は実感があります。

definition_en: A subdivision of currency, equal to one hundredth of an Estonian kroon.
meanings_ja: 転送された (in a digital sense)
example: I sent an email to my friend. / 私は友人にメールを送った。

definition_en: To put (something) down, to rest.
meanings_ja: (jibun ni hirogari) - to take one's own initiative
(kakumei suru) - to make a change or decision
(shoyou wo aranai) - to set boundaries or limits
example: I'm going to set my own goals and work towards achieving them. / watashi wa jibun no kyouki o shite, mottainai ni tsukamareru.

definition_en: The digit/figure 7 or an occurrence thereof.
meanings_ja: 七日間の期間、七回の繰り返し
example: I have seven books on my shelf. / 私の書棚には7冊の本があります。

definition_en: An area of land in private ownership (as opposed to common land).
meanings_ja: いくつかの, 少なくとも (two or three)
example: I have several books to read. / 私には複数の本を読む必要があります。

definition_en: A portion of something, especially a portion given or allotted to someone.
meanings_ja: 分かる人、部分に占める
example: I want to share my sandwich with you. / きみと私のサンドイッチを分かちあおう。

definition_en: An article of clothing that is worn on the upper part of the body, and often has sleeves, either long or short, that cover the arms.
example: I'm wearing a new shirt today. / 今日は新しい上着を着ます。

definition_en: (modal, auxiliary verb, defective) Used before a verb to indicate the simple future tense in the first person singular or plural.
meanings_ja: するべきである (alternative way to express obligation or necessity)
example: I should finish my homework tonight. / 今夜は宿題を終わる必要があります。

definition_en: A play, dance, or other entertainment.
meanings_ja: 上演, 演出 (in the context of a performance or exhibition)
example: I'm going to show you my new phone. / 私の新しい電話を見せます。

definition_en: To display, to have somebody see (something).
example: I showed them my new phone. / 私は、新しい電話を彼らに見せた。

definition_en: A bounding straight edge of a two-dimensional shape.
example: The company has two sides to its business - production and sales. / その会社は生産と販売の両方を営む。

definition_en: (in the singular) The ability to see.
meanings_ja: 見物 (mimonono) - visual perception or spectacle
example: The sight of the sunset on the beach was breathtaking. / 波止場での夕日は言葉にできない。

definition_en: A herbal preparation made from one plant, as opposed to something made from more than one plant.
example: The recipe is simple. / レシピは簡単です。

definition_en: The digit or figure 6.
example: I have six books on my shelf. / 私の書架には六冊の本があります。

definition_en: Someone who is slow; a sluggard.
example: The slow train took us several hours to reach our destination. / 運転が遅く、我々は目的地に数時間かかった。

definition_en: Any part of something that is smaller or slimmer than the rest, now usually with anatomical reference to the back.
example: The small dog is cute. / 小さな犬は可愛い。

definition_en: To hurt or sting.
example: This new phone is really smart. / これらの新しいスマートフォンは本当に頭の良いです。

definition_en: A craftsperson who works metal into desired forms using a hammer and other tools, sometimes heating the metal to make it more workable, especially a blacksmith.
example: John Smith is a skilled blacksmith. / ジョン・スミスは優秀な黒mithです。

definition_en: True, accurate.
meanings_ja: あのくらい (used to indicate a degree or extent)
example: The cake is so good that I ate it all. / そのお菓子はとても美味しかったので全部食べた。

definition_en: Of a measurement: approximately, roughly.
example: I'm going to buy some milk. /私は、ある程度のミルクを買います。

definition_en: A recognised or important person, a celebrity.
example: Somebodey helped me with my homework. / somebodyは私に私の宿題を手伝ってくれた。

definition_en: A partially specified but unnamed person.
example: I need to talk to someone about this problem. / この問題について話したい人に会いたい。

definition_en: An object whose nature is yet to be defined.
example: I want to buy something for my birthday. / 私の誕生日には何か買いたい。

definition_en: Former; sometime.
example: I sometimes go to the park on weekends. / 私は週末によく公園に行きます。

definition_en: The act of saying sorry; an apology.
example: "I'm sorry I was late." / "私は遅れたため、申し訳です"

definition_en: (heading) Of time.
example: The astronauts traveled through space to explore new planets. / 宇宙を旅して、新しい星を探検した。

definition_en: A low class bar, a speakeasy.
meanings_ja: 発言する (to express one's opinion or thoughts)
example: Can you speak English fluently? / 英語を流暢に許すことができますか？

definition_en: A reduction in consumer cost (usually for a limited time) for items or services rendered.
meanings_ja: 自己の能力や才能がある
example: This concert is special tonight. / これは今夜特に特別なコンサートです。

definition_en: The faculty of uttering articulate sounds or words; the ability to speak or to use vocalizations to communicate.
example: The president's speech inspired the nation. / 大統領の発話は国民を感動した。

definition_en: The act of standing.
meanings_ja: 訴願する (to make a formal complaint or appeal)
example: I couldn't understand the movie, so I decided to stand up and walk out. / 私は映画が分からないので、スタンドアップして退出した。

definition_en: Any small luminous dot appearing in the cloudless portion of the night sky, especially with a fixed location relative to other such dots.
example: The star shone brightly in the night sky. / 夜空に明るく輝いた星

definition_en: Any small luminous dot appearing in the cloudless portion of the night sky, especially with a fixed location relative to other such dots.
example: The stars in the sky are very beautiful. / 標高の星々は非常に美しい。

definition_en: The beginning of an activity.
example: I'm going to start my new job tomorrow. / 私は明日新しい仕事を始めます。

definition_en: To begin, commence, initiate.
example: I started learning Japanese last month. / 私は先月から日本語を勉強しています。

definition_en: The beginning of an activity.
example: The new project starts next Monday. / 新プロジェクトは来週月曜日に始まります。

definition_en: A stopping place.
example: I'm going to the station. / ジャは駅行きます。

definition_en: An advance or movement made from one foot to the other; a pace.
example: I'm taking a step back to think about my decision. / 私は自分の決意を考えに戻ります。

definition_en: A period of calm or silence.
example: I'm still learning Japanese. / 私は今も日本語を学んでいます。

definition_en: A place where items may be accumulated or routinely kept.
meanings_ja: 貯蔵所 (in a physical sense, e.g. warehouse)
example: I'm going to the store to buy some milk. / ミルクを買いに店へ行く。

definition_en: (usually academic) To review materials already learned in order to make sure one does not forget them, usually in preparation for an examination.
meanings_ja: 調査 (in a scientific or academic sense)
example: I'm going to study abroad next year. / 私は来年留学します。

definition_en: Something being indicated that is similar to something else.
meanings_ja: このくらいの, 似ている
example: I've never seen a dog so such. / 私はそんなに大きな犬を見ることがありません。

definition_en: Of excellent quality, superfine.
meanings_ja: 超 (above or beyond something, e.g. super speed)
example: The new smartphone is really super! / その新しいスマートフォンはとてもすごい！

definition_en: Physically secure and certain, non-failing, reliable.
example: Are you sure you want to go? / あなたは行くのか確かですか？

definition_en: The basic taste sensation induced by sugar.
example: The sweet old lady gave me a cookie. / その優しい老婦人は私にクッキーをくれた。

meanings_ja: テンポ (tempo, as in music or rhythm)
example: The concert's tempo was very fast. / コンサートのテンポはとても速かった。

definition_en: Furniture with a top surface to accommodate a variety of uses.
example: Can I put my bag on the table? / テーブルにバッグを置くことができますか?

definition_en: The or an act of taking.
meanings_ja:
I'd be happy to help you with the Japanese translation of the English word "take".

**Meaning 1:** 取りに行く (tori ni iku) / 挨取る (haitoru)
This meaning refers to taking action or making a move, such as "take a trip" or "take a chance".

**Meaning 2:** とる (toru) / 採用する (teishō suru)
This meaning refers to taking something, such as "take a book" or "take a picture".

**Example:**
English: I'll take a photo of the beautiful scenery.
Japanese: watashi wa sono bikini no shashin o toru.

Please note that there may be additional nuances and connotations depending on the context in which the word is used.

definition_en: The or an act of taking.
example: She takes a book from the shelf. / 彼女は書棚から本を取る。

definition_en: To communicate, usually by means of speech.
example: Can we talk about this later? / その後少し話そうかね?

definition_en: The action of the verb talk.
example: "They were talking about the new movie." / "彼らは新しい映画について話し合っていた。"

definition_en: A set of draught animals, such as two horses in front of a carriage.
example: Our team won the game yesterday. / 私たちのチームは昨日勝利した。

definition_en: A challenge, trial.
example: The new employee was given a test to evaluate her skills. / 新入社員はスキルを評価するため、試験を受けた。

definition_en: A writing consisting of multiple glyphs, characters, symbols or sentences.
example: What's your favorite book? The text is really interesting. / あなたの愛読書は何ですか？文章はとても面白いです。

definition_en: At that time; then.
meanings_ja: その他の物に比べて高い/低い
example: This car goes faster than that one. / その車は、その他の車よりも速く行く。

definition_en: An expression of appreciation; a thought.
example: "Can I borrow a pen?" / "あなたのペンを借りていただけますか？"

definition_en: An expression of appreciation; a thought.
example: Can you pass me that book? Thanks! / あなたは、その本を渡してくれませんか？ ありがとう！

definition_en: Something being indicated that is there; one of those.
meanings_ja: 当然、実際に (indicating a fact or reality)
example: That's a beautiful painting. / その絵は美しいですね。

definition_en: With a comparative or with more and a verb phrase, establishes a correlation with one or more other such comparatives.
meanings_ja: そのような( indicating a specific or particular one )
example: I'm going to the store. / ストアに行く。

meanings_ja: 何者かの所有物の (for a more formal or old-fashioned tone)
example: They lost their keys. / 彼らは鍵を失った。

definition_en: (plural) Those ones.
meanings_ja: それら (指す物の複数を示す場合)
example: I gave them my money. / 私は彼らに私の金をくれた。

definition_en: Used in comparisons, to introduce the basis of comparison.
example: I'll go to the store, and then I'll meet you at the park. / 私は店に行き、次には公園で会うつもりです。

definition_en: That place.
meanings_ja: その場所に、(存在する/いる)
example: I put my book there. / わたしはあれに本を置きました。

definition_en: The thing, item, etc. being indicated.
meanings_ja: このようなもの (for indicating similarity or shared characteristics among a group)
example: I love these shoes! /私はこの靴が大好きです！

definition_en: (the third-person plural) A group of people, animals, plants or objects previously mentioned.
meanings_ja: その人々, その者達 (when referring to people or individuals)
example: They went to the party yesterday. / 彼らは昨日パーティーに行った。

definition_en: That which is considered to exist as a separate entity, object, quality or concept.
example: I lost my favorite thing. / 私の愛物が失いました。

definition_en: That which is considered to exist as a separate entity, object, quality or concept.
meanings_ja: 問題、物事 (in a broader sense)
example: I've got too many things to do today. / 今日は多くの仕事がある。

definition_en: An act of thinking; consideration (of something).
meanings_ja: 考え付く (to think of something)
example: I will think about it. / 私はそれについて考える。

definition_en: Thought; gerund of think.
meanings_ja: 思いを通わせる (to be thinking)
example: I've been thinking about my future. / 私は将来について考えています。

definition_en: Something being indicated that is here; one of these.
meanings_ja: 最近のこと (referring to recent events or news)
これらのうちのひとつ (referring to one of multiple options)
example: "I'll take this book." / "私はこの本を取ります。"

definition_en: (demonstrative) The thing, person, idea, quality, event, action or time indicated or understood from context, especially if more remote geographically, temporally or mentally than one designated as "this", or if expressing distinction.
meanings_ja: あの人々 (指し示す目的の場合)
example: Those who are interested should apply by next Monday. / このあたりが関心を持つ人は、来週月曜日の出願期限内に申請してください。

definition_en: To ponder, to go over in one's head.
example: I had a thought that it would be better to take a taxi. / タクシーを乗りたいと思った。

definition_en: A numerical value equal to 1,000 = 10 × 100 = 103
meanings_ja: 一万 (in this case, "thousand" can refer to a quantity of one thousand)
example: The company has over a thousand employees. / その会社には一万人以上の従業員います。

definition_en: The digit/figure 3.
example: I have three apples. / 私は三つのリンゴがあります。

definition_en: A large slab of stone laid in a dry-stone wall from one side to the other; a perpend.
meanings_ja: 最終にまで、最後に至る
example: I walked through the park. / 私は公園を通り過ぎた。

definition_en: To change place.
meanings_ja: 弾く、打つ (in sports or games)
example: I'm going to throw a party tonight. / 今日はパーティーを開催します。

definition_en: The inevitable progression into the future with the passing of present and past events.
meanings_ja: 期間 (in a sense of duration), タイム (in a sense of punctuality)
example: What's your time like today? / 今日の時間は何時ですか？

definition_en: The inevitable progression into the future with the passing of present and past events.
example: The company has had times of financial difficulties. / その会社は財務的な困難な時期を経験しました。

definition_en: Toward a closed, touching or engaging position.
example: I'm going to Tokyo tomorrow. / 私は明日東京に向かいます。

definition_en: A current day or date.
example: I'm going to the movies today. / 今日は映画館に行く

definition_en: Coherent; well organized.
example: We're going to the concert together. / ぼくらはコンサートに一緒に行きます。

definition_en: (focus) Likewise.
example: This cake is too sweet. / このケーキはすぎる。

definition_en: To get into one's hands, possession or control, with or without force.
example: I took a picture of the sunset. / moi wa yuhi no shashin o torimashita.

definition_en: The highest or uppermost part of something.
example: The top of the mountain was covered in snow. / 山頂は雪で覆われていた。
The soft fabric touches my skin. / 素肌に優しく触れる。

definition_en: The act of traveling; passage from place to place.
meanings_ja: 運動する (in a broad sense, including physical activity)
example: I'm planning to travel to Tokyo next month. / 東京に旅行に行きます。

definition_en: A small wheel or roller, specifically the wheel of a gun carriage.
example: I drove a truck across the country. / 私は国中を大型自動車で運転しました。

definition_en: The state of being in alignment.
example: The true story of a hero. / 英雄の実話。

definition_en: An attempt.
example: I'm going to try this new restaurant. / この新しいレストランをやってみる。

definition_en: (heading) to make a non-linear physical movement.
meanings_ja: 転換する, 変化する
example: I need to turn off the lights before I go to bed. / 私は寝る前、電灯を消す必要があります。

definition_en: The assessed value of an asset from which the tax owing is computed.
meanings_ja: 電視機 (secondary meaning, referring to a TV set)
example: I'm watching my favorite show on TV. / 私はテレビで好きな番組を見ている。

definition_en: The digit/figure 2.
example: I have two dogs. / 私は2匹の犬を持っています。

definition_en: A grouping based on shared characteristics; a class.
meanings_ja: ジャンル (genre) - A category or style of something, such as a movie or music.
型 (shape) - The physical form or appearance of something.
example: What's your favorite book type? / あなたの好きな書籍ジャンルは何ですか?

definition_en: The name of the Latin-script letter U.
example: "What do you want to do?" / "U, I'm not sure..."

definition_en: The brother or brother-in-law of one’s parent.
example: My uncle is very kind. / 私のおじさんはとても優しい。

definition_en: To grasp a concept fully and thoroughly, especially (of words, statements, art, etc.) to be aware of the meaning of and (of people) to be aware of the intent of.
meanings_ja: 知っておく (informal), 概念を理解する (academic)
example: I don't understand why you're so upset. / 私はあなたがなぜ怒りがあるのかわかりません。

definition_en: The direction opposed to the pull of gravity.
meanings_ja: 高い位置に、浮かすように（ただしいちおう）
example: I'm feeling up today. / 今日はとても元気ですね。

definition_en: (personal) Me and at least one other person; the objective case of we.
example: We are the us. /私たちは我々です。

definition_en: The act of using.
meanings_ja: 利用する (to take advantage of something)
example: I will use my phone to call you. / 私は、貴方に電話をかけるために私の携帯電話を使用します。

definition_en: To utilize or employ.
meanings_ja: 過去に使っていた, 古くて使われなくなった
example: The old car was used for many years. / あの古い車は何年も使われた。

definition_en: True, real, actual.
example: This cake is very delicious. / このケーキはとてもおいしい。

definition_en: Television, television show, movie.
example: I watched a video of the concert. / 私はコンサートのビデオを観た。

definition_en: Television, television show, movie.
example: The company produces videos to promote its new product. / その会社は新製品を宣伝するためにビデオを作成しています。

definition_en: Sound uttered by the mouth, especially by human beings in speech or song; sound thus uttered considered as possessing some special quality or character
meanings_ja: 声明（しょうめい） (in a broader sense)
example: She heard the voice of her inner self. / 她は自分の内心の声を聞いた。

definition_en: A delay.
example: I'll wait for you at the station. / ステーションで待っています。

definition_en: The act of waking, or state of being awake.
example: I had a great time at the party, but then I started to feel tired and my eyes began to wake. / パーティーは楽しかったが疲れ始め、目が醒ます。

definition_en: To move on the feet by alternately setting each foot (or pair or group of feet, in the case of animals with four or more feet) forward, with at least one foot on the ground at all times. Compare run.
example: I like to walk in the park. /公園を徒歩で散歩する。

definition_en: To move on the feet by alternately setting each foot (or pair or group of feet, in the case of animals with four or more feet) forward, with at least one foot on the ground at all times. Compare run.
example: I'm going for a walking tour of the city tomorrow. / 私は明日市内の散歩ツアーに行くつもりです。

definition_en: A rampart of earth, stones etc. built up for defensive purposes.
meanings_ja: 室内の壁、庭の壁など建築的な意味も含む
example: The wall of the castle was very high. / 城塞の壁は非常に高かった。

definition_en: A desire, wish, longing.
example: I want to go to Tokyo. / 東京に行きたいです。

definition_en: To wish for or desire (something); to feel a need or desire for; to crave or demand.
meanings_ja: 求む、望む (欲しいものがある)
example: She wanted to go to Paris. / 彼女はパリに行きたいと言いました。

definition_en: A desire, wish, longing.
meanings_ja: 望むこと (in a more formal or polite context)
example: She wants to travel around the world. / 世界を旅行したいと思っている。
I was happy yesterday. / 私は昨日は幸せだった。

definition_en: A portable or wearable timepiece.
meanings_ja: 時計を見る (to look at a watch)
example: I'm going to watch the sunset tonight. / 今日夕方、日没を見に行く。

definition_en: To look at, see, or view for a period of time.
example: I'm watching TV. / 私はテレビを観察中。

definition_en: (heading) To do with a place or places.
meanings_ja: ルート (in a spatial sense, e.g. "the way to the airport")
example: What's the best way to get to the city center? / 何WAYがありますか？

definition_en: (personal) The speakers/writers, or the speaker/writer and at least one other person (not the person being addressed). (This is the exclusive we.)
meanings_ja: 我々、われわれ (more formal or literary)
example: We went to the park yesterday. / 私たちは昨日公園に行った。

definition_en: (in combination) clothing
meanings_ja: 身に付ける (to wear clothes), 使用する (to wear out)
example: I will wear my new shoes tomorrow. / 明日は新しい靴を履く。

definition_en: A collection of interlinked web pages on the World Wide Web that are typically accessible from the same base URL and reside on the same server.
meanings_ja: インターネット上のウェブページ集
example: The company's website has a lot of information about our products. / その会社のウェブサイトには、私たちの製品に関する情報が多い。

definition_en: Any period of seven consecutive days.
meanings_ja: 週次の区切りにされる時間のまとまり
example: I'm going to take a week off from work. / 僕は仕事から1週間休みを取る。

definition_en: Any period of seven consecutive days.
example: I'll be away for weeks. / 私は週々出かけます。

definition_en: The act of greeting someone’s arrival, especially by saying "Welcome!"; reception.
example: "I'm looking forward to seeing you. Welcome to my home!" / ""

definition_en: In good health.
meanings_ja: 深く、詳細に (meaning "well" as in "to get to the bottom of something")
example: I'm feeling well today. / 今日は良好に感じています。

definition_en: To move:
example: I went to the store. / 私は店に行った。

definition_en: A man, a husband
example: I was a teacher. / 私は教師でした。

definition_en: (Singlish) Used to contradict an underlying assumption held by the interlocutor.
example: What's your favorite food? / 君の好きな食べ物は何ですか？

definition_en: The time at which something happens.
meanings_ja: (目的を問う場合) なぜ, 何時に
example: I'll meet you when I finish my work. / 僕の仕事が終わったら、君と会います。

definition_en: The place in which something happens.
example: I'm going to the party. Where will you be? / パーティーに行こう。何処に行くの？

definition_en: (interrogative) What one or ones (of those mentioned or implied).
meanings_ja: 何者 (まれに、具体的なものを指す場合)
example: Which book do you want to read? / あなたが読みたい本は何ですか？

definition_en: A person under discussion; a question of which person.
meanings_ja: その人（referring to a specific person）
example: Who is going to the party? / どの子がパーティーに行くのか?

definition_en: Reason
example: Why did you become a doctor? / あなたは医者になった理由は何ですか?

definition_en: A ball that passes so far from the batsman that the umpire deems it unplayable; the arm signal used by an umpire to signal a wide; the extra run added to the batting side's score
example: The company's wide range of products helped them to gain a large customer base. / その会社は多くの製品を販売することで大きな顧客層を得ました。

definition_en: (now uncommon or literary) To wish, desire (something).
example: I will go to Tokyo. / 私は東京に行きます。

definition_en: Along, together with others, in a group, etc.
example: I'll go to the party with my friends. / 私は友達と一緒にパーティーゴイします。

definition_en: The smallest unit of language that has a particular meaning and can be expressed by itself; the smallest discrete, meaningful unit of language. (contrast morpheme.)
example: The words of encouragement helped her through the tough times. / 助けの言葉が彼女にとって大きな支えになった。

definition_en: (heading) Employment.
meanings_ja: 作業 (in a factory, office, etc.)
example: I need to get back to my work. / 私は職業活動に戻らなければ

definition_en: To do a specific task by employing physical or mental powers.
example: I worked on my project all day. / 私は一日中プロジェクトに取り組んだ。

definition_en: (usually in the plural) Operation; action.
meanings_ja: 就業中の状態 (in a state of working)
example: I'm working on my project. / 私はプロジェクトに取り組んでいます。

definition_en: (with "the") Human collective existence; existence in general.
meanings_ja: 社会、文化、歴史などの範囲
example: The world is my stage. / 私のステージは地球です。

definition_en: Something that would happen, or would be the case, under different circumstances; a potentiality.
example: I would go to the party if you came with me. / 私は、君と行くならパーティーに行こう。

definition_en: The act or style of writing.
example: I will write a letter to my friend. / 私は友人に手紙を書きます。

definition_en: The act or style of writing.
example: She writes a novel every year. / 彼女は毎年小説を執筆している。

definition_en: Graphism of symbols such as letters that express some meaning.
meanings_ja: 手書き (sho-shiki) - literal writing by hand
書籍 (shosaku) - published book, literary work
example: I'm doing some writing tonight. / 今夜、文章を書こうです。

definition_en: To form letters, words or symbols on a surface in order to communicate.
meanings_ja: 記述する (in a formal or official sense)
example: She wrote a bestseller. / 彼女はベストセラーを書き上げた。

definition_en: Expressing joy, celebration, glee, etc.
meanings_ja: アメリカンフルートな感じ
example: Are you going to the concert? / Yeah, I'll be there!

definition_en: A solar year, the time it takes the Earth to complete one revolution of the Sun (between 365.24 and 365.26 days depending on the point of reference).
meanings_ja: 時期（じき）、季節（きせつ） - This meaning refers to a specific period or era, rather than the traditional calendar year.
example: I've been living in this city for three years. / 私は3年間この街で住んでいる。

definition_en: A solar year, the time it takes the Earth to complete one revolution of the Sun (between 365.24 and 365.26 days depending on the point of reference).
example: The company has been around for many years. / これらの会社は多くの年を経てきた。

definition_en: An affirmative expression; an answer that shows agreement or acceptance.
example: Do you want to go out? / ドゥー ユー ワント トゥ ゴー アウト？ / ええ、行きたいです。

definition_en: To address (a person) using the pronoun you (in the past, especially to use you rather than thou, when you was considered more formal).
example: "What do you want to do?" / 「何するつもりですか？」
Your car is very nice. / あなたの車は非常に良いです。

definition_en: (reflexive pronoun) Your own self (singular).
example: Take care of yourself during your trip. / 旅行中は自分をよく注意してください。

definition_en: Suitableness.
example: I have a great ability to learn languages. / 私は言語を学ぶことが非常に優れている。

definition_en: In an absolute or unconditional manner; utterly, positively, wholly.
example: I think she's absolutely brilliant. / 私は彼女が完全に才能者であると思います。

definition_en: An unexpected event with negative consequences occurring without the intention of the one suffering the consequences.
example: The company is investigating the accident. / その会社は事故を調査中です。

definition_en: To succeed in something, now especially in academic performance.
example: I will achieve my goal if I work hard. / 私は努力して目標を遂行する。

definition_en: (crosswords, often in combination) A word that runs horizontally in the completed puzzle grid or its associated clue.
meanings_ja: 一方から他方まで (広い範囲)
example: The bridge crosses the river. / 桁は川を横にまたいでいます。

definition_en: Something done so as to accomplish a purpose.
example: The company will take actions to reduce its carbon footprint. / その会社はカーボンフットプリントを減らすために行動する。

definition_en: A person or thing that is acting or capable of acting.
example: The company is very active in reducing its carbon footprint. / その会社は炭素フットプリントを大幅に削減している。

definition_en: (modal) In act or in fact; really; in truth; positively.
example: I'm actually going to be late tonight. / 今夜は実際に遅刻するつもりです。

definition_en: Direction.
example: What's your address? / あなたの住所は何ですか?

definition_en: In a contrary direction to.
meanings_ja: 対抗する (in a competitive or oppositional sense)
example: I'm against the idea of raising tuition fees. / 私は、学費を増やすことを反対しています。

definition_en: To grant, give, admit, accord, afford, or yield; to let one have.
meanings_ja: 調節する (in certain contexts, e.g. to adjust or regulate something)
example: I allow my children to play outside until 9 PM. / 私の子供たちには9時まで外に出て遊ぶことを許しています。

definition_en: To grant, give, admit, accord, afford, or yield; to let one have.
meanings_ja: 権利を与える (to grant someone permission)
example: The new policy allows students to choose their own majors. / 新しいポリシーには、学生が自らの専攻を選択する権利があります。

definition_en: Something or someone that doesn't quite make it.
example: I'm almost done with my homework. / 私の宿題がほぼ終わりに近い。

definition_en: The total, aggregate or sum of material (not applicable to discrete numbers or units or items in standard English).
example: The amount of money I spent was too much. / 私が費やした金額は過大だった。

definition_en: In or at any location or an unknown location.
example: I can relax anywhere. / 私はどこでも静かに座れます。

definition_en: To be grateful or thankful for.
example: I appreciate your help. / 私はあなたの助けを尊重します。

definition_en: A measure of the extent of a surface; it is measured in square units.
meanings_ja: 面積 (mathematical area), スペース (space or area)
example: The city has a large area for recreational activities. / その市には遊び場が広い地域があります。

meanings_ja: アッシュリー（花火の名前）
example: Her name is Ashley. / 彼女の名前はアシュリーです。

definition_en: Such as one may avail oneself of; capable of being used for the accomplishment of a purpose.
meanings_ja: 手配可能, 到達可能
example: The hotel room is available from next month. / ホテルの部屋は、来月から使える。

definition_en: A necessary commodity, a staple requirement.
meanings_ja: 基本的、単純な (for the sense of being fundamental or elementary)
example: This course covers the basic concepts of programming. / このコースはプログラミングの基本的な概念をカバーします。

definition_en: A servant or valet to an army officer.
example: The new Batman movie is a huge hit! / 新しいバットマン映画は大ヒットです！

definition_en: A living creature.
example: The being of a person is more important than their physical appearance. / 人の存在は外見よりも重要である。

definition_en: In a lower place.
example: The book is below my desk. / 私の机下にある本です。

definition_en: The study of all life or living matter.
meanings_ja: 動植物の科学 (for the scientific study of living organisms)
example: The biology teacher explained the life cycle of frogs. / へらぎ科の教師はカエルの生態を説明した。

definition_en: The process of childbearing; the beginning of life.
meanings_ja: 子供の出産 (this is a more specific meaning, referring to the act of giving birth to a child)
example: The doctor was present at the birth / 産室で医師はいた

definition_en: A covering for a window to keep out light. The covering may be made of cloth or of narrow slats that can block light or allow it to pass.
example: I tried to ignore her, but it's hard to be blind to someone's suffering. / 彼女の苦難に注意を払うのは困難です。

definition_en: The control center of the central nervous system of an animal located in the skull which is responsible for perception, cognition, attention, memory, emotion, and action.
meanings_ja: 脳 (in a medical or scientific context)
example: The company wants to hire people with brains to solve complex problems. / その会社は複雑な問題を解決するために賢い人材をhireしようとしている。

definition_en: (ditransitive) To transport toward somebody/somewhere.
example: I'm bringing a gift to her birthday party. / 彼女の誕生日パーティーに贈物を持って行く。

definition_en: To separate into two or more pieces, to fracture or crack, by a process that cannot easily be reversed for reassembly.
example: I broke my favorite vase. / 私の好きな花瓶を壊しました。

definition_en: To form (something) by combining materials or parts.
example: The city was built on a hill. / この街は丘の上に造られた。

definition_en: One who adjusts, especially for the insurance industry's employment title "loss adjuster" (or "claims adjuster" in the United States).
example: I pressed all the buttons to turn off the computer. / コンピューターを落とすため、全てのボタンを押しました。

definition_en: (heading) To use one's voice.
meanings_ja: 職業、仕事 (in a broader sense)
example: She felt a calling to become a doctor. / 彼女は医者になることを感じた。

definition_en: A telephone conversation.
example: The company makes many calls to customers every day. / 会社は毎日多くの電話を客に掛けます。

definition_en: Sorrowfully.
example: I will carefully read the instructions. / 私はインストラクションを気を配って読みます。

definition_en: An actual event, situation, or fact.
meanings_ja: ケースの状態や状況 (e.g. medical cases)
example: The company is studying the cases of product failure. / その製品故障に関する調査を行っている。

definition_en: (often with of, typically of adverse results) The source of, or reason for, an event or action; that which produces or effects a result.
example: The cause of the fire was faulty wiring. / 火災の原因は不良のワイヤであった。

definition_en: The point in the interior of a circle that is equidistant from all points on the circumference.
meanings_ja: 中間点、中央部 (depending on the context)
example: The company's center is located in Tokyo. / 東京に本社を置く。

definition_en: (with "the") Something certain.
example: I'm certain that he'll be there on time. / 彼は確実に遅刻しない。

definition_en: To become something different.
meanings_ja: 変わった (in a more general sense, e.g. "changed his mind")
example: The weather changed suddenly. / 天気がuddenly変化した。

definition_en: A brief, sharp, not particularly loud, relatively high-pitched sound produced by the impact of something small and hard against something hard, such as by the operation of a switch, a lock or a latch, or a finger pressed against the thumb and then released to strike the hand.
meanings_ja: 音を立てる (in a digital or mechanical sense)
example: I clicked the button to submit my form. / ボタンをクリックしてフォームを提出しました。

definition_en: A team; a group of people who work together professionally.
meanings_ja: 会社 (in business or company sense)
example: We're going to start a co-working space. / ぼくらはコワーキングスペースを始める。

definition_en: To impart
example: "I need to communicate my ideas to the team." / "私はチームに自分のアイデアを情報交換する必要があります。"

definition_en: A completed survey.
example: The project was complete and ready to be presented. / プロジェクトは完璧で、発表する準備ができました。

definition_en: (manner) In a complete manner
example: The new policy will be completely implemented by next year. / 新しい政策は来年まで完全に実施されます。

definition_en: An option allowing a gamer to resume play after game over, when all lives have been lost.
example: I will continue my studies tomorrow. / 明日は学習を続けています。

definition_en: Influence or authority over something.
example: The company needs to control its expenses in order to stay profitable. / 会社は利益を保持するため、経費の支配が必要です。

definition_en: Having a slightly low temperature; mildly or pleasantly cold.
meanings_ja: Cooler weather の場合：暑さを感じない気候
example: The campers used a cooler to keep their drinks cold. / キャンプ客たちはドリンクを冷やすためにクーラーを使った。

definition_en: To incur a charge of; to require payment of a (specified) price.
example: The new smartphone will cost $500. / 新スマートフォンは500ドルの値段です。

definition_en: Two partners in a romantic or sexual relationship.
meanings_ja: ペア (pair) - two people in a romantic relationship
小さな集まり (small group) - a few people gathered together
example: I went to the movies with a couple friends. / 私は友達のカップルと映画に行きました。

definition_en: An insane or eccentric person; a crackpot.
meanings_ja: まったく思いつかない
example: He's crazy about playing video games. / 彼はビデオゲームについて狂っています。

definition_en: A living being; an animal or (sometimes derogatory) a human.
example: The creature lurked in the shadows. / 影に潜む生物があった。

definition_en: A stage of proficiency or qualification in a course of study, now especially an award bestowed by a university or, in some countries, a college, as a certification of academic achievement. (In the United States, can include secondary schools.)
example: I got a degree in engineering from Tokyo University. / 東京大学で工学の学位を取得した。

definition_en: A stage of proficiency or qualification in a course of study, now especially an award bestowed by a university or, in some countries, a college, as a certification of academic achievement. (In the United States, can include secondary schools.)
example: The room was hot, so I turned up the thermostat to 25 degrees Celsius / 室温が高かったので、25度センチグレーブに熱を上げました。

definition_en: A specification of an object or process, referring to requirements to be satisfied and thus conditions to be met for them to solve a problem.
example: I want to redesign my living room. / 私の住む部屋を再設計したいです。

definition_en: To change with a specific direction, progress.
example: The company plans to develop a new product. / その会社は新製品の開発を計画しています。

definition_en: Soil or earth.
example: The park was filled with dirt after the construction site. / その公園は建設現場の後ろにじりかに満ちていた。

definition_en: An abnormal condition of a human, animal or plant that causes discomfort or dysfunction; distinct from injury insofar as the latter is usually instantaneously acquired.
meanings_ja: 疾患 (in a broader sense, including environmental and social diseases)
example: The doctor diagnosed her with a rare disease. / がん病に診断された。

definition_en: Deserved acknowledgment.
example: My rent is due on the 15th. / 15日以降に賃金が納まる。

definition_en: To last, continue, endure.
example: I studied during my summer vacation. / 夏休み中、私は勉強しました。

definition_en: At a time in advance of the usual or expected event.
example: I'm going to meet you at 5pm, but I'll be there earlier. / 私は5時に会うつもりですが、より前には行きます。

definition_en: The result or outcome of a cause.
example: The new policy will have positive effects on the economy. / 新しい政策は経済にPOSITIVELY IMPACTを与える。

definition_en: (after a negative) As well.
example: I'll eat either pizza or pasta. / 私はピザやパスタを食べます。

definition_en: To come to an end
meanings_ja: 閉じた (in a more formal or business-like context)
example: The project ended last month. / そのプロジェクトは先月終了した。

definition_en: A person who is qualified or professionally engaged in any branch of engineering.
meanings_ja: 技術的知識をもつ専門家
example: The company hired a new engineer to design their next product. / その会社は新しい機械の設計を担当するために、新たにエンジニアを雇用した。

definition_en: To receive pleasure or satisfaction from something
meanings_ja: 愛しんでいる (to enjoy someone's company)
example: She enjoys playing tennis on weekends. / 奇しくも週末はテニスを楽しむ。

definition_en: The surroundings of, and influences on, a particular item of interest.
example: The company needs to improve its environment to reduce pollution. / その会社は、汚染を減らすために環境を改善する必要があります。

definition_en: (manner) In a special manner; specially.
example: I especially enjoy reading books on history. /歴史に関する本を特に楽しむ。

definition_en: (diminutive) An even number.
meanings_ja: また、また (to happen or do something repeatedly)
example: The concert will even continue until midnight. / コンサートはmidnightまで続きます。

definition_en: Occurring at any time, occurring even but once during a timespan.
meanings_ja: ずっと, 常に (for a longer period of time)
example: I've never eaten a pizza that's ever been as good as this one. / 私はこのピザがあんなに美味しかったことはない。

definition_en: (manner) without approximation; precisely.
example: I'll meet you exactly at 5 o'clock. / 私は5時点通りに会う。

definition_en: To stir the emotions of.
meanings_ja: 強くなる、快感を感じる
example: I'm excited to go to the concert tonight! / 今夜コンサートに行くのは熱情的！

definition_en: (stative) to be; have existence; have being or reality
meanings_ja: 生きている, 現存する (other meanings may exist)
example: The company exists despite financial difficulties. / 会社は財務問題にもかかわらず存続している。

definition_en: To predict or believe that something will happen
meanings_ja: 遅れてきたことに対する準備をさせる
example: I expect a lot from my team. / 私はチームに多くの期待している。

definition_en: The effect upon the judgment or feelings produced by any event, whether witnessed or participated in; personal and direct impressions as contrasted with description or fancies; personal acquaintance; actual enjoyment or suffering.
meanings_ja: 過去の出来事を知ること
example: I had a great experience traveling in Europe. / 欧州旅行で大きな経験を積みました。

definition_en: A land area free of woodland, cities, and towns; open country.
example: The company has a strong presence in many fields. / その会社は多くの分野で強い存在を持ちます。

definition_en: A drawing or diagram conveying information.
example: The figure on the chart showed a decline in sales. / チャートの図表は売り上げが下落したことを示した。

definition_en: A final examination; a test or examination given at the end of a term or class; the test that concludes a class.
example: The final score was 3-2. / 最終スコアは3-2でした。

definition_en: At the end or conclusion; ultimately.
example: I've been studying English finally. / 私は英語をとうとう学びました。

definition_en: To hit a fly ball; to hit a fly ball that is caught for an out. Compare ground (verb) and line (verb).
meanings_ja: 飛行 (in a figurative sense, e.g. "her spirits were flying")
example: The plane is flying at an altitude of 30,000 feet. / 航空機は30,000フィートの高さで飛んでいる。

definition_en: An extremely long time.
meanings_ja: いつまでも,ตลอด生
example: I will love you forever. / 私はあなたを常に愛する。

definition_en: (heading, physical) To do with shape.
example: I need to fill out this form in Japanese. / 私には日本語でこのフォームを埋める必要があります。

definition_en: One of the eight players (comprising two props, one hooker, two locks, two flankers and one number eight, collectively known as the pack) whose primary task is to gain and maintain possession of the ball (compare back).
example: I'll forward your message to John. / ジョンの方々にあなたのメッセージを順送します。

definition_en: To help forward; to assist.
meanings_ja: 手術を進める、進む (in a medical or scientific context)
example: I want to further my education. / 私は学習をより進めたい。

definition_en: A plait or fold in cloth, made by drawing a thread through it; a pucker.
example: The family will gather at my place tonight. / 我々家には今夜集む。

definition_en: A general fact or proposition; a generality.
example: The general public supported the new law. / 大多数の人々が新しい法律を支持しました。

definition_en: (ditransitive) To move, shift, provide something abstract or concrete to someone or something or somewhere.
example: The doctor says that my condition is given, and I don't need surgery. / ドクターは私の状態が既にあり、手術不要と言っています。

definition_en: (ditransitive) To move, shift, provide something abstract or concrete to someone or something or somewhere.
meanings_ja: 提供する, 支援する (in a broader sense)
example: She's always giving to charity. / 彼女は常に慈善活動に寄付している。

definition_en: (ditransitive) To obtain; to acquire.
example: I've gotten used to this new routine. / これ新しいルーチンに慣れました。

definition_en: The body with the power to make and/or enforce laws to control a country, land area, people or organization.
example: The government has decided to increase taxes. / 政府は税金を増加させることに決めた。

definition_en: The surface of the Earth, as opposed to the sky or water or underground.
example: The new office is built on a solid ground. / 新しいオフィスは堅実な土地に建てられています。

definition_en: To become larger, to increase in magnitude.
example: The children have grown taller. / 兄妹たちは背が高くなった。

definition_en: To give, pass, or transmit with the hand, literally or figuratively.
meanings_ja: 承諾された (in a formal sense, such as a contract or agreement)
example: The report was handed to the boss. / 上司に報告書が手渡された。

definition_en: To possess, own.
meanings_ja: (持つ, を有する) - This sense implies possessing or owning something.
example: I'm having a great time at the party tonight! / 今夜のパーティーはとても楽しいです!

definition_en: Furnishing help; giving aid; useful.
example: The instructions were helpful, so I was able to finish the project quickly. / 指導書は役に立ち、プロジェクトを早く完了することができました。

definition_en: To provide assistance to (someone or something).
example: The teacher is always helping students with their homework. / 教師は常に生徒たちの宿題を手伝っている。

definition_en: Very elevated; extending or being far above a base; tall; lofty.
example: The new skyscraper is higher than the old one. / 新しいビルは古い建物より高い。

definition_en: A thing that causes horror; a terrifying thing, particularly a prospective bad consequence asserted as likely to result from an act.
example: The movie was horrible. / 映画はやむことがあった。

definition_en: Very large.
example: The huge roller coaster was very scary! / あの巨大なローラーコースターはとても怖かった！

definition_en: A human being, whether man, woman or child.
example: The human brain is a complex organ. / 人間の脳は複雑な器官です。

definition_en: A human being, whether man, woman or child.
example: Humans have always been curious. / 人類は常に奇妙である。

definition_en: A hundred-dollar bill, or any other note denominated 100 (e.g. a hundred euros).
example: Hundreds of people came to the concert. / 数百人の人々がコンサートに集まった。

definition_en: An optical or other representation of a real object; a graphic; a picture.
example: The new smartphone takes a great image of the sunset. / 新スマートフォンは夕日をとても写してくれる。

definition_en: An optical or other representation of a real object; a graphic; a picture.
example: The photographer captured beautiful images of the sunset. / その日の夕日を美しい画像で撮影した。

definition_en: An impossibility
example: It's impossible to finish this project on time. / これらのプロジェクトを遅くない限り実現できない。

definition_en: A unit of length equal to one twelfth of a foot, or exactly 2.54 centimetres.
meanings_ja: 尺 (主に長さの単位として)
example: The fabric is 3 inches thick. / 服は30センチックメートル厚い。

definition_en: In the place of something (usually mentioned earlier); as a substitute or alternative.
example: I'll go to the movies instead of studying. / 私は勉強するのではなく映画に行く。

definition_en: (of people) To cause (someone) to be acquainted (with someone else).
example: Can you introduce me to your friend? / あなたの友達に会ってほしい？

definition_en: A distinct physical object.
meanings_ja: アイテム (ゲームや技術分野での使用)
example: The store is having a sale on all items. / 店は全ての物品に割引を実施しています。

definition_en: (reflexive pronoun) it; A thing as the object of a verb or preposition that also appears as the subject
example: The company will solve the problem itself. / その会社は、その問題を自分自身解決します。

definition_en: A set amount of travelling, seen as a single unit; a discrete trip, a voyage.
meanings_ja: 課程（especially in a figurative sense, e.g. "a journey of self-discovery")
example: I took a journey across Europe last summer / 私は去年の夏、ヨーロッパを旅した

definition_en: (etc.) A set of keys used to operate a typewriter, computer etc.
meanings_ja: コンピューター入力機器
キーボード (a more general term referring to a keyboard-like device)
example: I need to use my computer, so I'll boot it up and start typing on the keyboard. / コンピュータを起動し、キーボードでタイプしてみます。

definition_en: To perceive the truth or factuality of; to be certain of or that.
example: The famous actor is known for his charming smile. / 有名な俳優は、チャーミングなスマイルで知られています。

definition_en: Of considerable or relatively great size or extent.
example: This car is larger than yours. / この車はあなたのより大きい。

definition_en: A heavy, pliable, inelastic metal element, having a bright, bluish color, but easily tarnished; both malleable and ductile, though with little tenacity. It is easily fusible, forms alloys with other metals, and is an ingredient of solder and type metal. Atomic number 82, symbol Pb (from Latin plumbum).
meanings_ja: 導線、リード (in context of music or sports)
example: The company's new product will lead to a significant increase in sales. / その新製品が大幅な売り上げ増加を導く。

definition_en: Having much learning, knowledgeable, erudite; highly educated.
meanings_ja: 智恵のある (智恵のあるは、学識のあるや知識豊富なという意味)
example: She's a learned expert in the field of artificial intelligence. / 彼女は人工intelligenceの学際的な専門家です。

definition_en: To acquire, or attempt to acquire knowledge or an ability to do something.
example: I'm enjoying my learning experience abroad. / 私は留学中の私の学習体験を楽しみにしている。

definition_en: Something of the smallest possible extent; an indivisible unit.
example: The least expensive option was the best. / 最小の価格のオプションが一番よかった。

definition_en: To have a consequence or remnant.
example: I'm leaving Tokyo tonight. / 東京を今夜にやめる

definition_en: A tool for finding whether a surface is level, or for creating a horizontal or vertical line of reference.
example: The level of the lake is 500 meters. / озероの水位は500メートルです。
He has found a new sense of purpose in his lives. / 彼は新しい人生を見つけた。

definition_en: Something that is low; a low point.
example: The company has a low market value. / その会社の市場価値は小さなほどである。

definition_en: Situated close to, or even below, the ground or another normal reference plane; not high or lofty.
example: The temperature will lower tomorrow. / 明日は温度が下げます。
The Luke app is popular among young people. / ルークアプリが若い人々に人気です。
I just bought a new MacBook. / 私は新しいMacBookを購入しました。

definition_en: A device that directs and controls energy, often in the form of movement or electricity, to produce a certain effect.
meanings_ja: 製作設備 (secondary meaning, referring to manufacturing equipment)
example: The factory uses advanced machines to produce high-quality products. / 新しい機械を使用して高品質な製品を生産しています。

definition_en: The application of rituals or actions, especially those based on occult knowledge, to subdue or manipulate natural or supernatural beings and forces in order to have some benefit from them
example: The magician performed a magic trick. / マジシャンはすげえトラップを行った。

definition_en: A military rank between captain and lieutenant colonel.
example: The company is planning to hire a major developer for their new project. / その会社は新しいプロジェクトに大きな開発者を雇用する計画です。

definition_en: The act of forming, causing, or constituting; workmanship; construction.
example: I'm making a plan for my vacation. / 私は、休暇の計画を書いています。

meanings_ja: マリオ (a popular video game character)

example: The company is averaging a 10% increase in sales each quarter. / その会社は每四半期10%の売り上げ増加を実現しています。

definition_en: A feeling of fear and reverence.

ブレイン＝コンピューター・インターフェース（Brain-Computer Interface）

definition_en: The power or ability to generate an outcome

映像や音楽を編集するためのカット（short clip）

使用する/消費する (to use or consume a resource)

I'd be happy to help!

An example: the definite integration of integrable real functions in a real interval.
example: This smartphone has many functional features. / このスマートフォンには多くの機能があります。

definition_en: 109 bits, a thousand million (1,000,000,000) bits.

meanings_ja: 手助けする (or) 一緒に進む

definition_en: Anything surgically implanted in the body, such as a tissue graft or prosthesis, particularly breast implants.

definition_en: Something from which other things extend; a foundation.
example: The company's success was built on a strong base. / その会社の成功は強い 底盤で構築された。

definition_en: In a fundamental, essential or basic manner
meanings_ja: 大体に、ざっくっと (additional meaning)
example: I'm basically a morning person, so I wake up early. / 私は基本的に朝型なので早く起きる。

definition_en: A physical base or foundation.
example: The company's basis for hiring new employees is a thorough interview process. / その企業は、新しい職員を採用する基点として、徹底した面接のプロセスを基にしています。

definition_en: A device used to power electric devices, consisting of a set of electrically connected electrochemical or, archaically, electrostatic cells. A single such cell when used by itself.
meanings_ja: バッテリー (in the context of computer hardware)
example: The flashlight uses a battery to work. / フラッシュライトは電池を使って働きます。

definition_en: To hit; strike
example: The drummer's beating was perfect. / ドラマーさんの打撃はピッキングに満ちていた。

definition_en: The act of begging; an imploring request.
example: The homeless man begs for food on the street. / 路上で食物を頼みに暮らす無家の男。

definition_en: To start, to initiate or take the first step into something.
example: I've begun studying Japanese. / 私は日本語を始めました。

definition_en: Mental acceptance of a claim as true.
example: I have a strong belief in the power of education. / 教育の力には強い信仰があります。

definition_en: The unknown.
example: My goal is beyond my current ability. / 私の目標は、私の現在の能力を超えています。

definition_en: (modern British & Australian, short scale) a thousand million (logic: 1,000 × 1,000^2): 1 followed by nine zeros, 109; a milliard
example: The company's revenue was over a billion dollars last year. /その会社の収入は昨年10億ドルを超えた。

definition_en: A biological product.
example: The new biological research could lead to breakthroughs in medicine. / 新しい生物研究が医療の突破口を探ることができます。

definition_en: A piece of metal placed in a horse's mouth and connected to the reins to direct the animal.
meanings_ja: 一緒にくっついた小さな部品
example: The bits of information were scattered everywhere. / 情報の小さな部分は散らばっていた。

definition_en: To make something holy by religious rite, sanctify.
example: The baby's birth was a blessing to the couple. / Coupleはその子は幸運にあたった。

definition_en: To separate into two or more pieces, to fracture or crack, by a process that cannot easily be reversed for reassembly.
example: The company is breaking into a new market. / 会社は新しい市場入りしています。

definition_en: (manner) In a brief manner, summarily.
example: I'll explain it briefly. / 私はすぐに説明します。

definition_en: A group of similar things, either growing together, or in a cluster or clump, usually fastened together.
meanings_ja: 手の内側にある葉や花
example: She picked a bunch of flowers from the garden. / 彼女は庭から小さな花束を摘んだ。

definition_en: Able and efficient; having the ability needed for a specific task; having the disposition to do something; permitting or being susceptible to something.
meanings_ja: 承担できる範囲内にある
example: She's capable of completing the project on time. / 彼女はプロジェクトを期日 binnenに完了できる。

definition_en: An act of capturing; a seizing by force or stratagem.
example: The camera captured the moment perfectly. / カメラはその瞬間を完璧に取り逃がした。

definition_en: To set off an event or action.
example: The new policy is causing a lot of controversy. / 新しい政策は大きな論争を引き起こしている。

definition_en: A confrontation; a dare.
example: The company issued a challenge to its employees to come up with innovative ideas. / コマニーは従業員に新しいアイデアを提案することを目指した。

definition_en: A confrontation; a dare.
example: The company is facing many challenges in this competitive market. / その競争的市場では多くの課題に直面している。

definition_en: To invite (someone) to take part in a competition.
meanings_ja: 激しく新しい、困難な (in a positive sense, e.g. "a challenging project")
example: The hike was challenging, but the view from the top was breathtaking / 登山は困難だったが、頂上がにの景色はびっくりした

definition_en: The physical confine of a river or slough, consisting of a bed and banks.
meanings_ja: チャネル (データ通信の意味)
example: The company has several channels to reach its customers. / その会社は、顧客に向けた複数のチャネルを持つ。

definition_en: The physical confine of a river or slough, consisting of a bed and banks.
example: I watched my favorite show on TV channels. / テレビチャンネルで自分の好きな番組を見た。

definition_en: The amount of money levied for a service.
example: The company will charge us a fee for the late payment. / 会社は遅払いに対して手数料を請求します。

definition_en: A small piece broken from a larger piece of solid material.
meanings_ja: 電子決済の手段 (in a financial context)
example: I lost my phone's screen chip. / わたしの電話のスクリーンchipsを失ってしまった。

definition_en: To cut into pieces with short, vigorous cutting motions.
meanings_ja: petite (used to describe a person or thing that is small and neat, but not necessarily cut into pieces)
example: I love chopped salads in the summer. / 夏は切ったサラダが大好きです。

definition_en: A two-dimensional geometric figure, a line, consisting of the set of all those points in a plane that are equally distant from a given point (center).
example: Calculate the area of the circles. / 円の面積を計算することになります。

definition_en: A medical facility, such as a hospital, especially one for the treatment and diagnosis of outpatients.
example: The clinic provided free check-ups to underprivileged children. / 小児病院は貧困層の子供たちに無料の検診を提供した。

definition_en: In a close manner.
meanings_ja: detaliedly, carefully (if referring to a specific context)
example: The detective looked closely at the crime scene to find clues. / 犯罪現場を近くに捜査して証拠を探した。

definition_en: (physical) To remove a gap.
example: The company's financial year will be closing in March. / その会社の会計年度は3月に閉じます。

definition_en: A short symbol, often with little relation to the item it represents.
example: I need to crack the code to unlock the safe. / 私は-safeを解錠するためコードを解読する必要があります。

definition_en: An order to do something.
example: The captain gave the command to set sail. / 艦長は出港するよう指令した。

definition_en: The act or fact of communicating anything; transmission.
example: The company prioritizes effective communication to improve customer relationships. / その会社は、顧客との関係を改善するために効果的な情報のやり取りを優先しています。

definition_en: A group sharing a common understanding, and often the same language, law, manners, and/or tradition.
example: The community in Tokyo is very diverse. / 東京の共同体は非常に多様です。

definition_en: To finish; to make done; to reach the end.
example: I'm completing my project by tomorrow. / 私は明日までプロジェクトを完成させる。

definition_en: A network of interconnected systems.
meanings_ja: 技術的なシステム、プロセス
example: The complex system is difficult to understand. / 多面的なシステムは難解です。

definition_en: To reckon or calculate.
example: The company is investing heavily in computing to improve its efficiency. / その会社は効率化を目指してコンピューティングに大金を投資している。

definition_en: An abstract and general idea; an abstraction.
example: The company's new concept for a sustainable future. / その企業の新しい持続可能な未来のコンセプト。

definition_en: A logical clause or phrase that a conditional statement uses. The phrase can either be true or false.
meanings_ja: 条件 (具体的条件や前提)
example: The company will hire you only under certain conditions. / その会社は特定の条件でみて雇用します。

definition_en: Self-assurance.
example: She gained confidence after achieving her goal. / 彼女は達成した目標で自信を得た。

definition_en: A person in whom one can confide or share one's secrets: a friend.
meanings_ja: 気持ちのいい、自信ある
example: She seemed confident in her decision. / 彼女は決心を自信を持ってみえた。

definition_en: (of an object) To join (to another object): to attach, or to be intended to attach or capable of attaching, to another object.
meanings_ja: 関連する, 結びつく
example: The company has a strong network for connecting clients. / 会社はクライアントとのつながりを強化しています。

definition_en: The act of connecting.
example: The company has established a strong connection with its customers. / その会社は顧客との関係を強化しています。

definition_en: The act of connecting.
meanings_ja: 接続 (技術的、物理的な意味も含む)
example: The company's connections in Asia helped them expand their business. / アジアにおけるその会社の関係を通じて、営業を拡大した。

definition_en: The part of the mind that is aware of itself; the consciousness.
example: I'm conscious of my mistakes. / 私は私の間違いを自覚しています。

definition_en: That which is permanent or invariable.
example: The weather is constant in this region. / この地域では天気は一定です。

definition_en: The act of touching physically; being in close association.
example: I got my new job through contacts at the company. / 私は、新しい仕事を会社の関係者たちからゲットしました。

definition_en: An option allowing a gamer to resume play after game over, when all lives have been lost.
meanings_ja: 繰り返す (for a repeated action)
example: The project continues to evolve. / プロジェクトは進化を続ける。

definition_en: To proceed with (doing an activity); to prolong (an activity).
example: The project is continuing to make progress. / プロジェクトは進歩を続ける。

definition_en: Without stopping; without a break, cessation, or interruption
meanings_ja: 一続の, 中断のない
example: The meeting was continuous for three hours. / 会議は3時間連続して行われました。

definition_en: A difference in lightness, brightness and/or hue between two colours that makes them more or less distinguishable.
example: The new design is a contrast to the old one. / 新しいデザインは古いものとの対比です。

definition_en: To exercise influence over; to suggest or dictate the behavior of.
example: The pilot controlled the plane safely. / パイロットは安全に機械を支配した。

definition_en: Influence or authority over something.
example: The company has strict controls over its employees' social media use. / その会社は従業員のSNS使用に厳しい支配を敷く。

definition_en: A harmonic set of three or more notes that is heard as if sounding simultaneously.
example: I need to replace the cord on my phone charger. / 私の電話充電器のコードを置き換える必要があります。

definition_en: To incur a charge of; to require payment of a (specified) price.
meanings_ja: 責任 (in a broader sense, as in "accounting costs" or "social costs")
example: The new policy will increase the costs of doing business. / 新しい政策により、ビジネスを続けるための費用が増加します。

definition_en: The act of counting or tallying a quantity.
example: The company counts its profits carefully. / その会社は収入を慎重に計算している。

definition_en: To bring into existence; (sometimes in particular:)
meanings_ja: 新しいのを作り出す、設計する
example: The new company is creating a lot of jobs. / 新会社は多くの仕事を生み出しています。

definition_en: The ability to use imagination to produce a novel idea or product that is useful to society.
meanings_ja: 造物の能力, 創造力
example: The company values creativity in its employees. / その会社は従業員に対して創造力を高く評価しています。

definition_en: The generally unidirectional movement of a gas or fluid.
meanings_ja: 流れ、流電 (in a physical sense, e.g. electric current)
example: The company is currently undergoing restructuring. / 会社は現在の再編中です。

definition_en: At this moment, at present, now.
example: I'm currently studying English. / 私は現在英語を勉強しています。

definition_en: Frequent repetition of the same behavior; way of behavior common to many; ordinary manner; habitual practice; method of doing, living or behaving.
meanings_ja: 個別の順序や方法 (in this sense, "custom" refers to something that is tailored or designed specifically for an individual or organization)
example: The company has a custom of sending Christmas cards to its customers. / その会社は、Christmasカードを顧客に送る慣習を持つ。

definition_en: An interval of space or time in which one set of events or phenomena is completed.
example: I enjoy cycling on weekends. / 我々は週末にサイクリングを楽しむ。

definition_en: Injury or harm; the condition or measure of something not being intact.
meanings_ja: 損傷、損益 (both refer to harm or injury caused to something)
example: The storm caused significant damage to the city's infrastructure. / 巨大な損害を市のインフラストラクチャーに与えた。

definition_en: To impair the soundness, goodness, or value of; to harm or cause destruction.
example: The company's reputation was damaged by the scandal. / その会社の評判はスキャンダルにより損傷した。

definition_en: (plural: data) A measurement of something on a scale understood by both the recorder (a person or device) and the reader (another person or device). The scale is arbitrarily defined, such as from 1 to 10 by ones, 1 to 100 by 0.1, or simply true or false, on or off, yes, no, or maybe, etc.
meanings_ja: 数據 (in a scientific or statistical context)
example: The company needs accurate data to make informed business decisions. / その会社は正確な情報を基にして、有効なビジネス決定を行う必要がある。

definition_en: A group, set, or series of ten , particularly:
example: The company has been successful for decades. / 会社は長い期間成功しています。

definition_en: (of a physical distance) Extending far away from a point of reference, especially downwards.
example: The ocean is deeper than I thought. / 私は思ったより海は深かった。

definition_en: Without question and beyond doubt.
example: "I will definitely attend the meeting." / "私は会議にきっちりと参加します。"

definition_en: A key that may be pressed to delete something (such as text or files) from a computer.
example: I need to delete this file because it's taking up too much space on my computer. / マイコンに空間を取られているため、このファイルは削除する必要があります。

definition_en: To remove, get rid of or erase, especially written or printed material, or data on a computer or other device.
meanings_ja: 消去された (in computing or digital context)
example: The file was deleted from my computer, so I need to download it again. / コンピューターからファイルが削除されたため、再ダウンロードする必要があります。

definition_en: To set free from restraint or danger.
meanings_ja: 提供された、実現された (in this sense, it implies that something was fulfilled or achieved)
example: The package was delivered to my doorstep yesterday. / パッケージは昨日私の玄関先に配達された。

definition_en: The act of conveying something.
meanings_ja: 物件の引き渡し (in a business or official context)
example: Can you arrange delivery of the package by tomorrow? / 今日までにパッケージの配送を安排してください。

definition_en: To show how to use (something).
example: We need to demonstrate our commitment to reducing carbon emissions. / 我々は、炭素排出の削減に強く取り組む必要がある。

definition_en: (followed by on or upon, formerly also by of) To be contingent or conditioned; to have something as a necessary condition; to hinge on.
example: The project's success depends on many factors. / そのプロジェクトの成功は多くの要素にかかっている。

definition_en: The vertical distance below a surface; the degree to which something is deep
example: The ocean's depth is a mystery. / 海の深みは謎に包まれている。

definition_en: To represent in words.
example: The artist is describing a beautiful landscape in her painting. / アーティストは絵画で美しい景色を説明しています。

definition_en: To plan and carry out (a picture, work of art, construction etc.).
meanings_ja: 設計された、構想された
example: The company designed a new product to appeal to young customers. / 会社は若い顧客に向けた新製品を意図的に作りました。

definition_en: The top surface of a desk.
meanings_ja: コンピューターのデスクトップ
テーブルトップ（コンピューターに接続された）
example: The company's desktop was designed to be user-friendly. / その会社のデスクトップは、ユーザーフレンドリーに設計されました。

definition_en: Any piece of equipment made for a particular purpose, especially a mechanical or electrical one.
example: The new device is compatible with my phone. / 新しい 装置は私の電話に互換です。

definition_en: Any piece of equipment made for a particular purpose, especially a mechanical or electrical one.
example: The company develops new devices to improve efficiency. / 会社は新しい装置を開発して効率を改善しています。

definition_en: (manner) In a different way.
example: I will do it differently this time. / 私は今度異なってやります。

definition_en: A digital option.
meanings_ja: 電子的な, 数字化された
example: The company is going digital to improve efficiency. / その会社は効率を向上させるためデジタル化を進めている。

definition_en: In a direct manner; in a straight line or course.
meanings_ja:
I'm a Japanese-English dictionary! 📚

Here's the result:

直接的に

* 意味1: ตรงに
* 意味2: 自分の言葉で、直接的に (in one's own words, directly)

例文: The company will communicate with investors directly. / 会社は投資家たちと直接に連絡する。

Note that "directly" can have multiple meanings depending on the context, but I've focused on the most common ones.
example: The company will communicate with investors directly. / 会社は投資家たちと直接に連絡する。

definition_en: Absence of order; state of not being arranged in an orderly manner.
meanings_ja: 変乱、異常状態 (in a medical context)
example: The doctor diagnosed her with several mental disorders. / 医者は彼女が複数の精神的疾患に診断された。

definition_en: A show or spectacle.
meanings_ja: 展示 (for showing products or services)
example: The company will display its new product at the exhibition next week. / その会社は、来週の展示会で新製品を展示します。

definition_en: A jump or plunge into water.
example: I'm going to dive into the pool. / プールに はびこう。

definition_en: That which one is morally or legally obligated to do.
example: It's my duty to help my neighbor. / 私は隣人のために義務がある。

definition_en: The boundary line of a surface.
meanings_ja: でも、限界を超える可能性がある領域
example: The new policy is on the edge of being implemented. / 新しい政策は実施の端にあります。

definition_en: A soldier fit for duty
example: The new marketing strategy was effective in increasing sales. / 新しいマーケティング戦略は、売り上げを増やすことが実効的だった。

definition_en: In an efficient or effective manner; with powerful effect.
example: The new policy will be implemented effectively, improving customer satisfaction. / 新しいポリシーを実際に実施し、顧客満足度を向上させる。

definition_en: A cause; something that causes an effect
example: The new manufacturing process is efficient, reducing production time by half. / 新しい製造プロセスは、半分の時間短縮で効率的です。

definition_en: The work involved in performing an activity; exertion.
example: I'm making an effort to learn Japanese every day. / 私は毎日努力して日本語を学んでいます。

definition_en: An electrical engineer.
example: The electrical system of our house needs to be updated. / 我们家电气系統需要更新。

definition_en: Characterised by or exhibiting elegance.
example: The new restaurant's elegant atmosphere made our dinner date unforgettable. / その高級なAmbienceは、私たちのデートを忘れられないようにした。

definition_en: To stress, give emphasis or extra weight to (something).
meanings_ja: 簡潔にする (to make something clear or easy to understand)
example: I want to emphasize that this project has a tight deadline. / これらのプロジェクトには、厳しい期限があります。

definition_en: To make somebody able (to do, or to be, something); to give sufficient ability or power to do or to be; to give strength or ability to.
meanings_ja: できるようにする (for example, enable a user to access a system)
example: The new software enables users to edit documents online. / 新しいソフトウェアをオンラインでドキュメントを編集するようにする。

definition_en: To make somebody able (to do, or to be, something); to give sufficient ability or power to do or to be; to give strength or ability to.
example: The new software enables us to process large amounts of data efficiently. / 新しいソフトウェアで、我々は大量のデータを効率的に処理できる。

definition_en: To design, construct or manage something as an engineer.
meanings_ja: インフラストラクチャーの構築、システムの設計
example: The company invested heavily in engineering to develop a new product. / その会社は新製品の開発に技術的な投資を多くした。

definition_en: A person who is qualified or professionally engaged in any branch of engineering.
meanings_ja: 機関設計者 (mainly referring to mechanical engineers)
example: The company hired a team of engineers to design a new manufacturing process. / その会社は、新しい製造プロセスの設計ために技術チームを雇用した。

definition_en: To make a pledge to (someone); to promise, guarantee (someone of something); to assure.
meanings_ja: 謝意を抱く (in a business or official context, to ensure means to guarantee or confirm something)
example: We will ensure that all employees are trained properly. / 我々は全ての従業員が適切に訓練されることを確保します。

definition_en: The whole of something; the entirety.
meanings_ja: 一緒にした, 全体の
example: The entire city was evacuated due to the hurricane. / 市は全員退去したため、台風により。

definition_en: In the end; at some later time, especially after a long time, a series of problems, struggles, delays or setbacks.
example: I'll learn to play the piano eventually. / 私はついにピアノを習う。

definition_en: Facts or observations presented in support of an assertion.
example: The police collected physical evidence from the crime scene. / 警察は犯罪現場から物的証拠を集めました。

definition_en: To be larger, greater than (something).
example: The new policy will exceed expectations. / 新しいポリシーは期待を超えます。

definition_en: To change (something) from a smaller form and/or size to a larger one; to spread out or lay open.
meanings_ja: 拡大する (物理的なものを広げるなど)
example: The company plans to expand its market share by next year. / その会社は来年の市場シェアを拡大する計画を持つ。

definition_en: The effect upon the judgment or feelings produced by any event, whether witnessed or participated in; personal and direct impressions as contrasted with description or fancies; personal acquaintance; actual enjoyment or suffering.
meanings_ja: 感じたこと、できたこと
example: I've had many experiences in my life. / 私の人生に多くの経験があります。

definition_en: To destroy with an explosion.
meanings_ja: 強く広がった (in a figurative sense)
example: The bomb exploded in the city. / 市内で爆発した。

definition_en: To increase in extent.
example: I will extend my stay in Japan. /私は、日本で滞在を長くする。

definition_en: (degree) To an extreme degree.
example: The new restaurant is extremely popular. / Shin resutoran wa muyō ni popyurā desu.

definition_en: (manner) In a fair manner; fair; not biased or skewed or favouring a certain party
example: The company is fairly large. / その会社はやっぱり大きなものです。

definition_en: An attendant spirit, often in animal or demon form.
meanings_ja: like something you've seen or heard before
example: This town is familiar to me since I used to live here. / この町は私にはお馴染みの場所です。

definition_en: One's structure or make-up: form, shape, bodily proportions.
example: The new smartphone has a great camera as its main feature. / 最新のスマートフォンには、camaraがメインの特徴です。

definition_en: Critical assessment of a process or activity or of their results.
meanings_ja: 評価のフィードバック (evaluation feedback)
example: We received valuable feedback from customers and made some changes to our product. / 我々は、カスタマーの貴重な評価を受け、製品を少し改良しました。

definition_en: A colleague or partner.
meanings_ja: 同僚、同志 (in a professional or social context)

definition_en: A business partnership; the name under which it trades.
example: The company is a firm in the industry. / その企業は業界において定着しています。

definition_en: A movement in people or things with a particular way in large numbers or amounts
meanings_ja: 現在の状態を流れるように続く (current state flowing continuously)
流れや波を示す (to indicate a flow or wave)
example: The river's flow was affected by the dam. / ダムによって川の流れが影響された。

definition_en: A point at which reflected or refracted rays of light converge.
meanings_ja: 集中、注目する (psychological or physical attention)
example: The company will focus on developing new products. / 会社は新製品の開発に焦点を当てる。

definition_en: In a fortunate manner.
meanings_ja: 可能性の高い状況下で起きた出来事
example: I got accepted to my dream college, fortunately. / 私は夢の大学に入学できた、という幸運！

definition_en: In a full manner; without lack or defect.
meanings_ja: 到達、満足させる (to satisfy completely)
example: I want to fully understand the concept. / 私はこの概念を完全に理解したい。

definition_en: What something does or is used for.
example: The function of a CEO is to manage the company. / CEOの役割は会社を管理することです。

definition_en: To gamble.
meanings_ja: コンピューターゲーム
example: The gaming community has grown rapidly. / コンピューター・ゲームのファンクラブは急速に増加している。

definition_en: Popularly or widely.
example: The company generally operates from Monday to Friday. / その会社は月曜から金曜まで基本的に営業しています。

definition_en: The fact of creating something, or bringing something into being; production, creation.
example: This technology will be used by the next generation. / この技術は次の世代に使われる。

definition_en: A motion of the limbs or body, especially one made to emphasize speech.
meanings_ja: 表情（ひょうじょう） (in a figurative sense)
example: She made a polite gesture by offering me her seat. / 彼女は私の座席を献身した手勢をした。

definition_en: A hard gelatin made by boiling bones and hides, used in solution as an adhesive; or any sticky adhesive substance.
example: I need glue to fix this broken toy. / これの壊れた玩具を直すには接着剤が必要です。

definition_en: (minced oath) A mild expression of surprise or enthusiasm.
example: "Gosh, I didn't expect that!" / 「すげー、そんなことがない！」

definition_en: (sometimes figurative) Grip.
meanings_ja: understandingを得る (also means to comprehend or get a sense of something)
example: I couldn't grasp the complex concept at first. /最初は複雑な概念を理解できませんでした。

definition_en: Relatively large in scale, size, extent, number (i.e. having many parts or members) or duration (i.e. relatively long); very big.
example: The greater good requires our collective effort. / 我々の協力が大きな善を実現する必要があります。

definition_en: To write something manually, normally used to emphasise that it is not being typed.
meanings_ja: 書道 (書道は、特に美術的な意味での手書きを指す場合がある)
example: The teacher praised the student's handwriting on her essay. / わたしのエッセイの手書きが教師に評価された。

definition_en: To occur or take place.
example: The concert is happening tonight. / 今夜のコンサートは開催中です。
John Harrison was a famous clockmaker. / ジョン・ハリソンは有名な時計師だった。

definition_en: An area or a spot in a drawing, painting, or photograph that is strongly illuminated.
meanings_ja: 強調する、重要な部分を示す
example: The conference will highlight new developments in renewable energy. / その会議では再生可能エネルギーに関する新着情報をアピールします。

definition_en: In a high or esteemed manner.
example: The new employee was highly recommended by his previous company. / 新入社員は、前企業から非常に推薦されました。

definition_en: A thing that holds.
meanings_ja: 掴みの物 (tool holder, container holder)
example: The phone's battery is low, so I need to get a new holder. / 電池が減りきったので、新しい持つものを探さないと。

definition_en: To grasp or grip.
meanings_ja: 保持中 (in a state of being held)
example: The company is holding its annual meeting this week. / その会社はこの週末に年次総会を開催する。

definition_en: (manner) In an honest manner.
example: I'm going to be honestly with you, I don't think we can make it. / 私はあなたに対して純情に、私たちは行くことができないと考えています。

definition_en: To want something to happen, with a sense of expectation that it might.
meanings_ja: 構想している (expecting or anticipating something to happen)
example: I've been hoping to visit Japan soon. / 私は今すぐに日本を訪ねてみたいと思っています。

definition_en: To shed light upon.
example: The book will illustrate the history of Japan. / その書籍は日本の歴史を映像化する。

definition_en: The act of illustrating; the act of making clear and distinct; education; also, the state of being illustrated, or of being made clear and distinct.
meanings_ja: 解説図 (for explanatory illustrations), 説明図 (for instructional illustrations)
example: The artist's latest illustration is a beautiful depiction of a fantastical world. / オルタナティブの世界を描いたアーティストの最新絵画は美しい。

definition_en: The image-making power of the mind; the act of mentally creating or reproducing an object not previously perceived; the ability to create such images.
example: The child's imagination ran wild with the new toy. / 子供のイマジネーションは、新しい玩具に狂い咲いた。

definition_en: The striking of one body against another; collision.
example: The company's new product had a significant impact on the market. / その新製品は市場に大きな影響を与えた。

definition_en: The act of improving; advancement or growth; a bettering
meanings_ja: 適用 (in a technical sense, e.g. in software development)
example: The team made improvements to the algorithm to increase its accuracy. / そのチームはアルゴリズムをより正確にするため適切に改善した。

definition_en: The act of improving; advancement or growth; a bettering
example: The company invested in improvements to increase productivity. / 会社は生産性を高めるために改善に投資した。

definition_en: To bring into a group, class, set, or total as a (new) part or member.
example: The company will hire people, including those with disabilities. / その会社は障害者も含めて雇用する。

definition_en: An amount by which a quantity is increased.
meanings_ja: 評価・評点の上がる (in financial or academic sense)
example: The company will increase its production to meet demand. / 会社は需要に応じて生産を増やす。

definition_en: (of a quantity, etc.) To become larger or greater.
meanings_ja: 高くなった (in quantity or degree)
example: The company's profits have increased significantly over the past year. / その会社の利益は過去1年間に著しく増加した。

definition_en: (of a quantity, etc.) To become larger or greater.
meanings_ja: さらに大きくなる (in a physical sense)
example: The company's profits are increasing steadily. / その企業の利益は、徐々に増加している。

definition_en: Too implausible to be credible; beyond belief; unbelievable.
example: The fireworks display was incredible! / 火worksは驚異的でした！

definition_en: (manner) In an incredible manner; not to be believed.
example: This new restaurant is incredibly delicious! / これはとても美味しい!

definition_en: The state or quality of being independent; freedom from dependence; exemption from reliance on, or control by others; self-subsistence or maintenance; direction of one's own affairs without interference.
example: The country's independence was recognized by the international community. / 国際社会が認めたその国の独立性。

definition_en: A candidate or voter not affiliated with any political party, a freethinker, free of a party platform.
example: The company wants to be independent from its parent organization. / その会社は親会社から独立した企業として活動したい。

definition_en: A person considered alone, rather than as belonging to a group of people.
example: Each individual has their own unique personality. / それぞれの人々は独特の性格を持つ。

definition_en: To live or reside in.
meanings_ja: 生息する (natural habitats, e.g. animals)
example: The city is inhabited by over a million people. / 市は100万人以上が住む。

definition_en: To wound or cause physical harm to a living creature.
example: The hiker got injured while climbing the mountain. / 登山中、登山者は傷ついた。

definition_en: Damage to the body of a human or animal.
meanings_ja: kegai（damage or loss, often referring to emotional or psychological trauma）
example: The athlete suffered severe injuries in the car accident. / 車事故で重いlettekkuを受けた。

definition_en: Damage to the body of a human or animal.
example: He suffered a severe injury in the car accident. /彼は自動車事故で重傷を負いました。

definition_en: The act or process of putting in; infusion.
example: The computer requires a lot of input to process the data. / コンピューターには大量の入力を必要としています。

definition_en: An image inserted into text.
meanings_ja: 評価する (in a digital context, e.g. inserting data into a database)
example: The software allows you to insert your personal information. / ソフトウェアには、自分の情報を入力できるようになっています。

definition_en: To infuse into the mind; to communicate to the spirit; to convey, as by a divine or supernatural influence; to disclose preternaturally; to produce in, as by inspiration.
example: The artist was inspired by the beautiful landscape. / 芸術家は美しい景色に触発された。

definition_en: To infuse into the mind; to communicate to the spirit; to convey, as by a divine or supernatural influence; to disclose preternaturally; to produce in, as by inspiration.
meanings_ja: スピリチュアルな影響がある
example: The teacher's inspiring words motivated me to work hard. / 教師の言葉に感銘を受けて努力することを促された。

definition_en: To connect, set up or prepare something for use.
meanings_ja: インストールされた (computer software or hardware)
example: The new employee was installed as the team leader yesterday. / 昨日、新しい部下がチームリーダーとして設置されました。

definition_en: Capacity of mind, especially to understand principles, truths, facts or meanings, acquire knowledge, and apply it to practice; the ability to comprehend and learn.
example: The company values intelligence in its employees. / その会社は従業員の情報能力を評価している。

definition_en: The goal or purpose behind a specific action or set of actions.
example: What's your intention behind this project? / そのプロジェクトの目的は何ですか？

definition_en: An invisible person or thing; specifically, God, the Supreme Being.
example: The invisible force field protected me from harm. / 私は、見えない力場に守られた。

definition_en: To roll or fold up; to wind round; to entwine.
meanings_ja: 含む、関係させる (複雑な状況やプロセスに影響を与える)
